T07udanav_u:uv_1.1_0: stīnam iddham vinodya iha sampraharṣya ca mānasam / [stīnamiddham]
T07udanav_u:uv_1.1_1: śṛṇuta imam pravakṣyāmi udānam jina bhāṣitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.2_0: evam uktam bhagavatā sarva abhijñena tāyinā /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.3_0: anityā bata saṃskārā utpāda vyaya dharmiṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.3_1: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣām vyupaśamaḥ sukham //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.4_0: ko nu harṣaḥ ka;ānanda;evam prajvalite sati /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.4_1: andha kāram praviṣṭāḥ stha pradīpam na gaveṣatha //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.5_0: yāni imāny apaviddhāni vikṣiptāni diśo diśam /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.5_1: kapota varṇāny asthīni tāni drṣṭvā iha kā ratiḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.6_0: yām eva prathamām rātrim garbhe vasati mānavaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.6_1: aviṣṭhitaḥ sa vrajati gataś ca na nivartate //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.7_0: sāyam eke na dṛśyante kālyam dṛṣṭā mahā janāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.7_1: kālyam ca eke na dṛṣyante sāyam dṛṣṭā mahā janāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.8_0: tatra ko viśvasen martyo daharo asmi iti jīvite /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.8_1: daharā api ṃriyante hi narā nāryaś ca-n-ekaśaḥ // [anekaśaḥ]
T07udanav_u:uv_1.9_0: garbha;eke vinaśyante tathā eke sūtikā kule /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.9_1: parisṛptās tathā hy eke tathā eke paridhāvinaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.10_0: ye ca vṛddhā ye ca dahrā ye ca madhyama puruṣāḥ / [pūruṣāḥ]
T07udanav_u:uv_1.10_1: anupūrvam pravrajanti phalam pakvam va bandhanāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.11_0: yathā phalānām pakvānām nityam patanato bhayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.11_1: evam jātasya martyasya nityam maraṇato bhayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.12_0: yathā api kumbha kāreṇa mṛttikā bhājanam kṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.12_1: sarvam bhedana paryantam evam martyasya jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.13_0: yathā api tantre vitate yad yad uktam samupyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.13_1: alpam bhavati vātavyam evam martyasya jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.15_0: yathā nadī pārvatīyā gacchate na nivartate /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.15_1: evam āyur manuṣyāṇām gacchate na nivartate //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.16_0: kisaram ca parittam ca tac ca duhkhena samyutam /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.16_1: udake daṇḍa rājī iva kṣipram eva vinaśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.17_0: yathā daṇḍena gopālo gāḥ prāpayati gocaram /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.17_1: evam rogair jarā mṛtyuḥ āyuḥ prāpayate nṛṇām //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.18_0: atiyānti hy aho rātrā jīvitam ca uparudhyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.18_1: āyuḥ kṣīyati martyānām kunadīṣu yathā odakam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.19_0: dīrghā jāgarato rātrir dīrgham śrāntasya yojanam /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.20_0: putro me asti dhanam me asti ity evam bālo vihanyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.20_1: ātmā eva hy ātmano na asti kasya putraḥ kuto dhanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.21_0: anekāni sahasrāṇi nara nārī śatāni ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.21_1: bhogān vai samudānīya vaśam gacchanti mṛtyunaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.22_0: sarve kṣaya antā nicayāḥ patana antāḥ samucchrayāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.22_1: samyogā viprayoga antā maraṇa antam hi jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.23_0: sarve sattvā mariṣyanti maraṇa antam hi jīvitam / [satvā]
T07udanav_u:uv_1.23_1: yathā karma gamiṣyanti puṇya pāpa phala upagāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.24_0: narakam pāpa karmāṇaḥ kṛta puṇyās tu sad gatim /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.24_1: anye tu mārgam bhāvya iha nirvāsyanti nirāsravāḥ // [bhāvyeha]
T07udanav_u:uv_1.25_0: na eva antarīk se na samudra madhye na parvatānām vivaram praviśya /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.25_1: na vidyate asau pṛthivī pradeśo yatra sthitam na prasaheta mṛtyuH //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.26_0: ye ca iha bhūtā bhaviṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve gamiṣyanti prahāya deham /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.26_1: tām sarva hānim kuśalo viditvā dharme sthito brahmacaryam careta //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.27_0: jīrṇam ca dṛṣṭvā iha tathā eva rogiṇam mṛtam ca dṛṣṭvā vyapayāta cetasam /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.27_1: jahau sa dhīro gṛha bandhanāni kāmā hi lokasya na supraheyāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.28_0: jīryanti vai rāja rathāḥ sucitrā hy atho śarīram api jarām upaiti /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.28_1: satām tu dharmo na jarām upaiti santo hi tam satsu nivedayanti //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.29_0: dhik tvām astu jare grāmye virūpa karaṇī hy asi /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.29_1: tathā mano ramam bimbam jarayā hy abhimarditam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.30_0: yo api varṣa śatam jīvet so api mṛtyu parāyaṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.30_1: anu hy enam jarā hanti vyādhir vā yadi vā antakaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.31_0: sadā vrajanti hy anivartamānā divā ca rātrau ca vilujyamānāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.31_1: matsyā;iva atīva hi tapyamānā duhkhena jāti maraṇena yuktāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.32_0: āyur divā ca rātrau ca caratas tiṣṭhatas tathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.32_1: nadīnām vā yathā sroto gacchate na nivartate //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.33_0: yeṣām rātri diva apāye hy āyur alpataram bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.33_1: alpa udake va matsyānām kā nu teṣām ratir bhavet //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.34_0: parijīrṇam idam rūpam roga nīḍam prabhaṅguram /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.34_1: bhetsyate pūty asaṃdeham maraṇa antam hi jīvitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.35_0: aciram bata kāyo ayam pṛthivīm adhiśeṣyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.35_1: śunyo vyapeta vijñāno nirastam vā kaḍaṅgaram // [śūnyo]
T07udanav_u:uv_1.36_0: kim anena śarīreṇa sravatā pūutinā sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.36_1: nityam roga abhibhūtena jarā maraṇa bhīruṇā //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.37_0: anena pūti kāyena hy ātureṇa prabhaṅguṇā /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.37_1: nigacchatha parām śāntim yoga kṣemam anuttaram //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.38_0: iha varṣam kariṣyāmi hemantam grīṣmam eva ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.38_1: bālo vicintayaty evam antarāyam na paśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.39_0: tam putra paśu sammattam vyāsakta manasam naram /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.39_1: sutpam grāmam mahaugha eva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati // [mahaughaiva]
T07udanav_u:uv_1.40_0: na santi putrās trāṇāya na pitā na api bāndhavāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.40_1: antakena abhibhūtasya na hi trāṇā bhavanti te //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.41_0: idam kṛtam me kartavyam idam kṛtvā bhaviṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.41_1: ity evam spandato martyān jarā mṛtyuś ca mardati //
T07udanav_u:uv_1.42_0: tasmāt sadā dhyāna ratāḥ samāhitā hy ātāpino jāti jarā anta darśinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_1.42_1: māram sasainyam hy abhibhūya bhikṣavo bhaveta jātī maraṇasya pāragāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.1_0: kāma jānāmi te mūlam saṃkalpāt kāma jāyase /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.1_1: na tvām saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.2_0: kāmebhyo jāyate śokaḥ kāmebhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.2_1: kāmebhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.3_0: ratibhyo jāyate śoko ratibhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.3_1: ratibhhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.4_0: madhura agrā vipāke tu kaṭukā hy abhinanditāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.4_1: kāmā dahanti vai bālān ulkā iva amuñcataḥ karam //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.5_0: na tad dṛḍham bandhanam āhur āryā yad āyasam dāravam balbajam vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.5_1: saṃrakta cittasya hi manda buddheḥ putreṣu dāreṣu ca yā;avekṣā //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.6_0: etad dṛḍham bandhanam āhur āryāḥ samantataḥ susthiram duṣpramokṣam /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.6_1: etad api chittvā tu parivrajanti hy anapekṣiṇaḥ kāma sukham prahāya //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.7_0: na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalpa rāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.7_1: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathā eva loke;atha atra dhīrā vinayanti chandam // [cchandam]
T07udanav_u:uv_2.8_0: na santi nityā manujeṣu kāmāḥ santi tv anityāḥ kāmino yatra baddhāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.8_1: tāṃs tu prahāya hy apunar bhavāya hy anāgatam mṛtyu dheyam vadāmi //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.9_0: chanda jāto hy avasrāvī manasā anāvilo bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.9_1: kāmeṣu tv apratibaddha citta;ūrdhva sroto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.10_0: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokam stokam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.10_1: karmāro rajatasya eva nirdhamen malam ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.11_1: yad yaj jahāti kāmānām tat tat sampadyate sukham //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.12_0: sarvam cet sukham iccheta sarva kāmān parityajet / [kāmām]
T07udanav_u:uv_2.12_1: sarva kāma parityāgī hy atyantam sukham edhate //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.13_0: yāvat kāmān anusaran na tṛptim manaso adhyagāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.13_1: tato nivṛttim pratipaśyamānās te vai tṛptāḥ prajñayā ye sutṛptāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.14_0: śreyasī prajñayā tṛptir na hi kāmair vitṛpyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.14_1: prajñayā puruṣam tṛptam tṛṣṇā na kurute vaśam //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.15_0: gṛddhā hi kāmeṣu narāḥ pramattā hy adharme bata te ratāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.15_1: antarāyam na te paśyanty alpake jīvite sati /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.16_0: durmedhasam hanti bhogo na tv iha ātma gaveṣiṇam /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.16_1: durmedhā bhoga tṛṣṇābhir hanty ātmānam atho parān //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.17_0: na karṣāpaṇa varṣeṇa tṛptiḥ kāmair hi vidyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.17_1: alpa āsvāda sukhāḥ kāmā;iti vijñāya paṇḍitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.18_0: api divyeṣu kāmeṣu sa ratim na adhigacchati /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.18_1: tṛṣṇā kṣaya rato bhavati buddhānām śrāvakaḥ sadā //
T07udanav_u:uv_2.19_0: parvato api suvarṇasya samo himavatā bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.19_1: vittam tam nālam ekasya etaj jñātvā samam caret // [vittam tam na alam ekasya]
T07udanav_u:uv_2.20_0: duhkham hi yo veda yato nidānam kāmeṣu jantu sa katham rameta /
T07udanav_u:uv_2.20_1: upadhim hi loke śalyam iti matvā tasya eva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.1_0: vitarka pramathitasya jantunas tīvra rāgasya śubha anudarśinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.1_1: bhūyas tṛṣṇā pravardhate gāḍham hy eṣa karoti bandhanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.2_0: vitarka vyupaśame tu yo rato hy aśubham bhāvayate sadā smṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.2_1: tṛṣṇā hy eṣa prahāsyate sa tu khalu pūti karoti bandhanam // [eṣā]?
T07udanav_u:uv_3.3_0: kāma andha jāla prakṣiptās tṛṣṇayā ācchāditāḥ prajāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.3_1: pramattā bandhane baddhā matsyavat kupinā mukhe /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.3_2: jarā maraṇam āyānti vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka;iva mātaram //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.4_0: manujasya pramatta cāriṇas tṛṣṇā vardhati mālutā iva hi / [māluteva hi]
T07udanav_u:uv_3.4_1: sa hi saṃsarate punaḥ punaḥ phalam icchann iva vānaro vane //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.5_0: saritāni vai snehitāni vai saumanasyāni bhavanti jantunaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.5_1: ye sātasitāḥ sukha eṣiṇas te vai jāti jarā upagā narāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.6_0: tṛṣṇābhir upaskṛtāḥ prajāḥ paridhāvanti śaśā va vāgurām /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.6_1: samyojanaiḥ saṅga saktā duhkham yānti punaḥ punaś cira rātram //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.7_0: tṛṣṇayā grathitāḥ sattvā rakta cittā bhavā bhave / [satvā]
T07udanav_u:uv_3.7_1: te yoga yukta māreṇa hy ayoga kṣemiṇo janāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.7_2: jarā maraṇam āyānti yogā hi duratikramāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.8_0: yas tu tṛṣṇām prahāya iha vīta tṛṣṇo bhavā bhave /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.9_0: ya;etām sahate grāmyām tṛṣṇām loke sudustyajām /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.9_1: śokās tasya pravardhante hy avavṛṣṭā bīraṇā yathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.10_0: yas tv etām tyajate grāmyām tṛṣṇām loke sudustyajām /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.10_1: śokās tasya nivartante;uda bindur iva puṣkarāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.11_0: tad vai vadāmi bhadram vo yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.11_1: tṛṣṇām samūlam khanata uśīra arthī iva bīraṇām /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.11_2: tṛṣṇāyāḥ khāta mūlāyā na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.12_0: tṛṣṇā dvitīyaḥ puruṣo dīrgham adhvānam āśayā /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.12_1: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsarate garbham eti punaḥ punaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.12_2: ittham bhāva anyathī bhāvaḥ saṃsāre tv āgatim gatim //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.13_0: tām tu tṛṣṇām prahāya iha vīta tṛṣṇo bhavā bhave /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.13_1: na asau punaḥ saṃsarate tṛṣṇā hy asya na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.14_0: yayā devā manuṣyāś ca sitās tiṣṭhanti hārthikāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.14_1: tarata etām viṣaktikām kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.14_2: kṣaṇa atītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.15_0: tṛṣṇā hi hetuḥ saritā viṣaktikā gaṇḍasya nityam visṛtā iha jālinī /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.15_1: latām pipāsām apanīya sarvaśo nivartate duhkham idam punaḥ punaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.16_0: yathā api mūlair anupadrutaiḥ sadā chinno api vṛkṣaḥ punar eva jāyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.16_1: evam hi tṛṣṇā anuśayair anuddhṛtair nirvartate duhkham idam punaḥ punaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.17_0: yathā api śalyo dṛḍham ātmanā kṛtas tam eva hanyād balasā tv adhiṣṭhitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.17_1: tathā tv iha ādhyātma samutthitā latās tṛṣṇā vadhāya upanayanti prāṇinām //
T07udanav_u:uv_3.18_0: etad ādīnavam jñātvā tṛṣṇā duhkhasya sambhavam /
T07udanav_u:uv_3.18_1: vīta tṛṣṇo hy anādānaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.1_0: apramādo hy amṛta padam pramādo mṛtyunaḥ padam /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.1_1: apramattā na ṃriyante ye pramattāḥ sadā mṛtāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.2_0: etām viśeṣatām jñātvā hy apramādasya paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.2_1: apramādam pramudyeta nityam āryaḥ sva gocaram //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.3_1: spṛśanti dhīrā nirvāṇam yoga kṣemam anuttaram //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.4_1: prajñā prasādam āruhya tv aśokaḥ śokinīm prajām /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.4_2: parvatasthā eva bhūmisthān dhīro bālān avekṣate //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.5_1: dvīpam karoti medhāvī tam ogho na abhimardati //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.6_0: utthānavataḥ smṛta ātmanaḥ śubha cittasya niśāmya cāriṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.6_1: samyatasya hi dharma jīvino hy apramattasya yaśo abhivardhate //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.7_0: adhicetasi mā pramadyata pratatam mauna padeṣu śikṣata /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.7_1: śokā na bhavanti tāyino hy upaśāntasya sadā smṛta ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.8_0: hīnām dharmām na seveta pramādena na saṃvaset /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.8_1: mithyā dṛṣṭim na roceta na bhavel loka vardhanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.9_0: samyag dṛṣṭir adhīmātrā laukikī yasya vidyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.9_1: api jāti sahasrāṇi na asau gacchati durgatim //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.10_1: apramādam tu medhāvī dhanam śreṣṭhī iva rakṣati //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.11_1: apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy āsrava kṣayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.12_0: pramādam na anuyujyeta na kāma rati saṃstavam /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.12_1: apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy acalam sukham //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.13_0: na ayam pramāda kālaḥ syād aprāpte hy āsrava kṣaye /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.13_1: māraḥ pramattam anveti siṃham vā mṛga mātṛkā //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.14_0: sthānāni catvāri naraḥ pramatta;āpadyate yaḥ para dāra sevī /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.14_1: apuṇya lābham hy anikāma śayyām nindām tṛtīyam narakam caturtham //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.15_0: apuṇya lābham ca gatim ca pāpikām bhītasya bhītābhir atha alpikām ratim/
T07udanav_u:uv_4.15_1: nindām ca paśyan nwpateś ca daṇḍam parasya dārāṇi vivarjayeta //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.15_a_0: apuṇya lābhaś ca gatiś ca pāpikā bhītasya bhītābhir atha alpikā ratiḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.15_a_1: rājā ca daṇḍam gurukam dadāti kāyasya bhedād narakeṣu paśyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.16_0: pratiyatyā iva tat kuryād yaj jānedd hitam ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.16_1: na śākaṭika cintābhir mandam dhīraḥ parākramet //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.17_0: yathā śākaṭiko mārgam samam hitvā mahā patham /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.17_1: viṣamam mārgam āgamya chinna akṣaḥ śocate bhṛśam //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.18_0: evam dharmād apakramya hy adharmam anuvartya ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.18_1: bālo mṛtyu vaśam prāptaś chinna akṣa;iva śocate //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.19_0: yat kṛtyam tad apaviddham akṛtyam kriyate punaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.19_2: āsravās teṣu vardhante;ārāt te hy āsrava kṣayāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.20_0: yeṣām tu susamārabdhā nityam kāya gatā smṛtiḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.20_1: akṛtyam te na kurvanti kṛtye sātatya kāriṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.21_0: na tāvatā dharma dharo yāvatā bahu bhāṣate /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.21_1: yas tv iha alpam api śrutvā dharmam kāyena vai spṛśet /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.21_2: sa vai dharma dharo bhavati yo dharme na pramādyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.22_0: subahv api iha sahitam bhāṣamāṇo na tat karo bhavati naraḥ pramattaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.22_1: gopā eva gāḥ saṃgaṇayan pareṣām na bhāgavān śrāmaṇya arthasya bhavati // [bhāgavān śrāmaṇya arthasya]
T07udanav_u:uv_4.23_0: alpam api cet sahitam bhāṣamāṇo dharmasya bhavati hy anudharma cārī /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.23_1: rāgam ca doṣam ca tathaiva moham prahāya bhāgī śrāmaṇya arthasya bhavati //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.25_1: apramatto hy ubhāv arthāv atigṛhṇāti paṇḍitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.26_0: dṛṣṭa dhārmika;eko arthas tathā anyaḥ sāmparāyikaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.26_1: artha abhisamayād dhīraḥ paṇḍito hi nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.27_0: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.27_1: durgād uddharate tmānam paṅka sannaiva kuñjaraḥ // [ātmānam] [paṅkasannaiva]
T07udanav_u:uv_4.28_0: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.28_1: dhunāti pāpakām dharmām pattrāṇi iva hi mārutaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.29_0: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.29_1: samyojanam aṇu sthūlam dahann agnir iva gacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.30_0: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.30_1: spṛśati hy anupūrveṇa sarva samyojana kṣayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.31_0: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.31_1: pratividhyate padam śāntam saṃskāra upaśamam sukham //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.32_0: apramāda rato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhaya darśakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.32_1: abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasya eva so antike //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.33_1: asmṛtiś ca pramādaś caiva anutthānam asamyamaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.34_1: tad aṅgam paribudhyadhvam smṛtir mā antar adhīyata //
T07udanav_u:uv_4.35_0: uttiṣṭhen na pramādyeta dharmam sucaritam caret /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.35_1: dharma cārī sukham śete hy asmiṃl loke paratra ca / [asmim loke]
T07udanav_u:uv_4.36_0: apramāda ratā bhavata suśīlā bhavata bhikṣavaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.37_1: dhunidhvam mṛtyunaḥ sainyam naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // [naḍa agāram]
T07udanav_u:uv_4.38_0: yo hy asmin dharma vinaye tv apramatto bhaviṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_4.38_1: prahāya jāti saṃsāram duhkhasya antam sa yāsyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.1_0: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.1_1: priyebhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.2_0: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.2_1: priyāṇām anyathī bhāvād unmādam api gacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.3_0: śokā hi ye vai paridevitam ca duhkham ca lokasya hi naikarūpam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.3_1: priyam pratītya iha tad asti sarvam priye asati syān na kathaṃcid etat //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.4_0: tasmādd hi te sukhitā vīta śokā yeṣām priyam na asti kathaṃcid eva /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.4_1: tasmād aśokam padam eṣamāṇaḥ priyam na kurvīta hi jīva loke //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.5_0: mā priyaiḥ saṃgamo jātu mā ca syād apriyaiḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.5_1: priyāṇām adarśanam duhkham apriyāṇām ca dharśanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.6_0: priyāṇām ca vinā bhāvād apriyāṇām ca saṃgamāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.7_0: priyam mṛtam kāla gatam jñātayaḥ sahitāḥ sthitāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.7_1: śocanti dīrgham adhvānam duhkho hi priya saṃgamaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.8_0: tasmāt priyam na kurvīta priya bhāvo hi pāpakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.8_1: granthās teṣām na vidyante yeṣām na asti priya apriyam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.9_0: ayuge yujya ca ātmānam yuge ca ayujya sarvadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.9_1: artham hitvā priya grāhī spṛhayaty artha yogine //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.10_0: priya rūpa sāta grathitā deva kāyāḥ pṛthak sthitāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.10_1: āghādinaḥ paridyūnā mṛtyu rāja vaśam gatāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.11_0: ye vai divā ca rātrau caiva;apramattāḥ priyam jahati nityam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.11_1: te vai khananti tv agha mūlam mṛtyu-r-āmiṣam durativartyam //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.12_0: asādhu sādhu rūpeṇa priya rūpeṇa ca apriyam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.13_0: ātmānam cet priyam vidyān na enam pāpena yojayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.13_1: na hy etat sulabham bhavati sukham duṣkṛta kāriṇā //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.14_0: ātmānam cet priyam vidyān na enam pāpena yojayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.14_1: etadd hi sulabham bhavati sukham sukṛta kāriṇā //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.15_0: ātmānam cet priyam vidyād rakṣed enam surakṣitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.15_1: yathā pratyanta nagaram gambhīra parikham dṛḍham /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.16_0: ātmānam cet priyam vidyād gopayet tam sugopitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.16_1: yathā pratyanta nagaram guptam antar bahisthiram / [antar bahiḥ sthiram]
T07udanav_u:uv_5.17_0: evam gopayata ātmānam kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.17_1: kṣaṇa atītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.18_0: sarvā diśas tv anuparigamya cetasā na eva adhyagāt priyataram ātmanaḥ kvacit /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.18_1: evam priyaḥ pṛthag ātmā pareṣām tasmān na hiṃsyāt param ātma kāraṇam //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.19_0: sarve daṇḍasya bibhyanti sarveṣām jīvitam priyam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.19_1: ātmānam upamām kṛtvā na eva hanyān na ghātayet //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.20_0: cira pravāsinam yadvad dūrataḥ svastinā āgatam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.20_1: jñātayaḥ suhṛdo mitrāś ca abhinandanti āgatam //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.21_0: kṛta puṇyam tathā martyam asmāṃl lokāt param gatam / [asmāl lokāt]
T07udanav_u:uv_5.21_1: puṇyāny eva abhinandanti priyam jñātim iva āgatam //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.22_1: puṇyāni para loke hi pratiṣṭhā prāṇinām hi sā //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.23_0: puṇyam devāḥ praśaṃsanti sama caryām ca yaś caret /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.23_1: iha ca anindito bhavati pretya svarge ca modate //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.24_0: dharmastham śīla sampannam hrīmantam satya vādinam /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.24_1: ātmanaḥ kārakam santam tam janaḥ kurute priyam //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.25_0: pareṣām ca priyo bhavati hy ātma artham kriyate api ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.25_1: dṛṣṭe ca dharme prāśaṃsyaḥ sāmparāye ca sad gatiḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.26_0: avavadeta anuśāsīta ca asabhyāc ca nivārayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.26_1: asatām na priyo bhavati satām bhavati tu priyaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_5.27_0: asantaś caiva santaś ca nānā yānti tv itaś cyutāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_5.27_1: asanto narakam yānti santaḥ svarga parāyaṇāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.1_0: śīlam rakṣeta medhāvī prārthayan vai sukha trayam / [prārthayaṃ]
T07udanav_u:uv_6.1_1: praśaṃsā vitta lābham ca pretya svarge ca modanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.2_0: sthānāny etāni sampaśyan śīlam rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.2_1: āryo darśana sampannaḥ sa loke labhate śivam //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.3_0: sukham śīla samādānam kāyo na paridahyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.3_1: sukham ca rātrau svapati pratibhuddhaś ca nandati //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.4_0: śīlam yāvaj jarā sādhu śraddhā sādhu pratiṣṭhitā /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.4_1: prajñā narāṇām ratnam vai puṇyam coraiḥ sudurharam //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.5_0: kṛtvā puṇyāni saprajño dattvā dānāni śīlavān / [datvā]
T07udanav_u:uv_6.5_1: iha ca atha paratra asau sukham samadhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.6_0: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣur indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.6_1: bhojane ca api mātrajño yukto jāgarikāsu ca //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.7_0: viharann evam ātāpī hy aho rātram atandritaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.7_1: abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasya eva so antike //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.8_0: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣuś cittam prajñām ca bhāvayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.8_1: ātāpī nipako nityam prāpnuyād duhkha saṃkṣayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.9_0: tasmāt satata śīlī syāt samādher anurakṣakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.10_0: sa tu vikṣīṇa samyogaḥ kṣīṇa māno niraupadhiḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.10_1: kāyasya bhedat saprajñaḥ saṃkhyān na upaiti nirvṛtaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.11_0: śīlam samādhiḥ prajñā ca yasya hy ete subhāvitāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.11_1: so atyanta niṣṭho vimalas tv aśokaḥ kṣīṇa sambhavaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.12_1: atikramya māra viṣayam ādityo vā virocate //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.13_1: śīlam samādhiḥ prajñā ca pāripūrim na gacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.14_0: channam eva abhivarṣati vivṛtam na abhivarṣati /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.14_1: tasmādd hi channam vivared evam tam na abhivarṣati // [cchannam]
T07udanav_u:uv_6.15_0: etadd hi dṛṣṭvā śikṣeta sadā śīleṣu paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.15_1: nirvāṇa gamanam mārgam kṣipram eva viśodhayet //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.16_0: na puṣpa gandhaḥ prativātam eti na vāhnijāt tagarāc candanād vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.16_1: satām tu gandhaḥ prativātam eti sarvā diśaḥ sat puruṣaḥ pravāti //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.17_0: tagarāc candanāc ca api vārṣikāyās tathā utpalāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.17_1: etebhyo gandha jātebhyaḥ śīla gandhas tv anuttaraḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.18_0: alpa mātro hy ayam gandho yo ayam tagara candanāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.18_1: yas tu śīlavatām gandho vāti deveṣv api iha saḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_6.19_1: samyag ājñā vimuktānām māro mārgam na vindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_6.20_0: eṣa kṣema gamo mārga;eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.1_0: kāya pradoṣam rakṣeta syāt kāyena susaṃvṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.1_1: kāya duścaritam hitvā kāyena sukṛtam caret //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.2_0: vācaḥ pradoṣam rakṣeta vacasā saṃvṛto bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.2_1: vāco duścaritam hitvā vācā sucaritam caret //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.3_0: manaḥ pradoṣam rakṣeta manasā saṃvṛto bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.3_1: mano duścaritam hitvā manaḥ sucaritam caret //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.4_0: kāya duścaritam hitvā vaco duścaritāni ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.4_1: mano duścaritam hitvā yac ca anyad doṣa saṃhitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.5_0: kāyena kuśalam kuryād vacasā kuśalam bahu /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.6_0: kāyena kuśalam kṛtvā vacasā cetasā api ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.6_1: iha ca atha paratra asau sukham samadhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.7_0: ahiṃsakā vai munayo nityam kāyena saṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.7_1: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.8_0: ahiṃsakā vai munayo nityam vācā susaṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.8_1: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.9_0: ahiṃsakā vai munayo manasā nitya saṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.9_1: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.10_0: kāyena saṃvṛtā dhīrā dhīrā vācā susaṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.10_1: manasā saṃvṛtā dhīrā dhīrāḥ sarvatra saṃvṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.10_2: te yānti hy acyutam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.11_0: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā ca saṃvaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.11_1: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.11_2: sarvatra saṃvṛto bhikṣuḥ sarva duhkhāt pramucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_7.12_0: vācā anurakṣī manasā susaṃvṛtaḥ kāyena caiva akuśalam na kuryāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_7.12_1: etām śubhām karma pathām viśodhayann ārādhayen mārgam ṛṣi praveditam //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.1_0: abhūta vādī narakān upaiti yaś ca anyad apy ācarati iha karma /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.1_1: ubhau hi tau pretya samau niruktau nihīna dharmau manujau paratra //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.2_0: puruṣasya hi jātasya kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.2_1: yayā chinatti ha ātmānam vācā durbhāṣitam vadan //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.3_0: yo nindiyām praśaṃsati tān api nindati ye praśaṃsiyāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.3_1: sa cinoti mukhena tam kalim kalinā tena sukham na vindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.4_0: alpa mātro hy ayam kalir ya;ihha akṣeṇa dhanam parājayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.4_1: ayam atra mahattaraḥ kalir yaḥ sugateṣu manaḥ pradūṣayet //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.5_0: śatam sahasrāṇi nirarbudāni ṣaṭ triṃśatim pañca tathā arbudāni /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.5_1: yān ārya garhī narakān upaiti vācam manaś ca praṇidhāya pāpakam //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.6_0: asatam hi vadanti pāpa cittā narakam vardhayate vadhāya nityam /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.6_1: anavadya balas titīkṣate tām manaso hy āvilatām vivarjayitvā // [titikṣate]
T07udanav_u:uv_8.7_0: yaḥ śāsanam hy arhatām āryāṇām dharma jīvinām /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.8_0: kalyāṇikām vimuñceta na eva muñceta pāpikām /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.8_1: muktā kalyāṇikī śreyo muktā tapati pāpikā //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.9_0: na ca mukte pramuñcet tām muñcamāno hi bādhyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.9_1: na evam āryāḥ pramuñcanti muktā bālair hi pāpikā //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.10_0: mukhena samyato bhikṣur manda bhāṣī hy anuddhataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.10_1: artham dharmam ca deśayati madhuram tasya bhāṣitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.11_0: subhāṣitam hy uttamam āhur āryā dharmam vaden na adharmam tad dvitīyam /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.11_1: priyam vaden na apriyam tat tṛtīyam satyam vaden na asatyam tac caturtham //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.12_0: tām eva vācam bhāṣeta yayā ātmānam na tāpayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.12_1: parāṃś ca na vihiṃseta sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.13_0: priya udyam eva bhāṣeta yā hi vācā abhinanditā /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.13_1: na ādadāti yayā pāpam bhāṣamāṇaḥ sadā priyam //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.14_0: satyā syād amṛtā vācā satya vācā hy anuttarā /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.14_1: satyam arthe ca dharme ca vācam āhuḥ pratiṣṭhitām //
T07udanav_u:uv_8.15_0: yām buddho bhāṣate vācam kṣemām nirvāṇa prāptaye /
T07udanav_u:uv_8.15_1: duhkhasya anta kriyā yuktām sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.1_0: eka dharmam atītasya mṛṣā vādasya jantunaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.1_1: vitīrṇa para lokasya na akāryam pāpam asti yat //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.2_0: śreyo hy ayoguḍā bhuktās taptā hy agni śikhā upamāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.2_1: na tu bhuñjīita duhśīlo rāṣṭra piṇḍam asamyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.3_0: sa ced bibheṣi duhkhasya sa cet te duhkham apriyam /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.3_1: mā kārṣīḥ pāpakam karma tv āvir vā yadi vā rahaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.4_0: sa cet pāpāni karmāṇi kariṣyasi karoṣi vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.4_1: na te duhkhāt pramokṣo asti hy utplutya api palāyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.5_0: na eva antarīkṣe na samudra madhye na parvatānām vivaram praviśya /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.5_1: na vidyate asau pṛthivī pradeśo yatra sthitam na prasaheta karma //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.5a_0: kṛṣṇa śuklāni karmāṇi na praṇaśyanti dehinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.5a_1: kālam prā - - - iṣyante kṛtāny upa---nāni ca //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.6_0: yat pareṣām vigarheta karma dṛṣṭvā iha pāpakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.6_1: ātmanā tan na kurvīta karma baddho hi pāpakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.7_0: ye kūṭa māna yogena viṣameṇa ca karmaṇā /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.7_1: manuṣyān upahiṃsanti parato upakrameṇa vā / [paratopakrameṇa vā]
T07udanav_u:uv_9.7_2: te vai prapātam prapatanti karma baddhā hi te janāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.8_0: yat karoti naraḥ karma kalyāṇam atha pāpakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.8_1: tasya tasya eva dāyādo na hi karma praṇaśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.9_0: vilumpate hi puruṣo yāvad asya upakalpate /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.9_1: tato anye tam vilumpanti sa viloptā vilupyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.10_0: kurvan hi manyate bālo na etam mām āgamiṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.10_1: sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpa karmaṇām //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.11_0: kurvan hi manyate bālo na etam mām āgamiṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.11_1: paścāt tu kaṭukam bhavati vipākam pratiṣevataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.12_0: sa cet pāpāni karmāṇi kurvan bālo na budhyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.12_1: karmabhiḥ svais tu durmedhā hy agni dagdha eva tapyate // [agni dagdhaiva tapyate]
T07udanav_u:uv_9.13_0: caranti bālā duṣprajñā hy amitrair iva ca ātmabhiḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.13_1: kurvantaḥ pāpakam karma yad bhavati kaṭukam phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.14_0: na tat karma kṛtam sādhu yat kṛtvā hy anutapyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.14_1: rudann aśru mukho yasya vipākam pratiṣevate //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.15_0: tat tu karma kṛtam sādhu yat kṛtvā na anutapyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.16_0: hasantaḥ pāpakam karma kurvanty ātma sukha eṣiṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.17_0: na hi pāpa kṛtam karma sadyaḥ kṣīram iva mūrchati / [mūrcchati]
T07udanav_u:uv_9.17_1: dahan tad bālam anveti bhasma ācchanna;iva analaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.18_0: na hi pāpa kṛtam karma sadyaḥ śastram iva kṛntati /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.18_1: sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpa karmaṇām /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.18_2: paścāt tu kaṭukam bhavati vipākam pratiṣevataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_9.19_0: ayaso hi malaḥ samutthitaḥ sa tad utthāya tam eva khādati /
T07udanav_u:uv_9.19_1: evam hy aniśāmya cāriṇam svāni karmāṇi nayanti durgatim //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.1_0: śraddhā atha hrī śīlam atha api dānam dharmā;ime sat puruṣa praśastāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.1_1: etam hi mārgam divyam vadanti;etena asau gacchati deva lokam //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.2_0: na vai kadaryā deva lokam vrajanti bālā hi te na praśaṃsanti dānam /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.2_1: śrādhas tu dānam hy anumodamāno apy evam hy asau bhavati sukhī paratra //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.3_0: śraddhā hi vittam puruṣasya śreṣṭham dharmaḥ sucīrṇaḥ sukham ādadhāti /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.3_1: satyam hi vai svādutamam rasānām prajñā ājīvī jīvinām śreṣṭha;uktaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.4_0: śraddhā dhano hy arhatām dharmam nirvāṇa prāptaye /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.4_1: śuśrūṣur labhate prajñām tatra tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ / [śuśruśur]
T07udanav_u:uv_10.5_0: śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena ca arṇavam /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.6_0: śraddhā dvitīyā puruṣasya bhavati prajñā ca enam praśāsati /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.6_1: nirvāṇa abhirato bhikṣuś chinatti bhava bandhanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.7_0: yasya śraddhā ca śīlam caiva ahiṃsā samyamo damaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.7_1: sa vānta doṣo medhāvī sādhu rūpo nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.8_0: śrāddhaḥ śīlena sampannas tyāgavān vīta matsaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.8_1: vrajate yatra yatra eva tatra tatra eva pūjyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.9_0: yo jīva loke labhate śraddhām prajñām ca paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.9_1: tadd hi tasya dhanam śreṣṭham hīnam asya itarad dhanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.10_0: āryāṇām darśanaḥ kāmaḥ sad dharma śravaṇe rataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.10_1: vinīta mātsarya malaḥ sa vai śrāddho nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.11_0: śrāddho gṛhṇāti pātheyam puṇyam coraiḥ sudurharam /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.11_1: coram harantam vārayati harantaḥ śramaṇāḥ priyāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.12_0: dadanty eke yathā śraddhā yathā vibhavato janāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.12_1: tatra yo durmanā bhavati pareṣām pāna bhojane /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.12_2: na asau divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.13_0: yasya tv ete samucchinnās tāla mastakavadd hatāḥ / [mastakavad dhatāḥ]
T07udanav_u:uv_10.13_1: sa vai divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.14_0: vīta śraddham na seveta hradam yadvadd hi nirjalam /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.14_1: sa cet khanel labhet tatra vāri kardama gandhikam //
T07udanav_u:uv_10.15_0: śrāddham prājñam tu seveta hradam yadvaj jala arthikaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10.15_1: acchodakam viprasannam śīta toyam anāvilam / [accha udakam]
T07udanav_u:uv_10.16_0: na anuraktā;iti rajyeta hy atra vai dīryate janaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_10_17_0: anitya kāma tṛṣṇā ca;apramādas tathā priyaḥ / [p.184]
T07udanav_u:uv_10_17_1: śīlam sucaritam vāca karma śraddhā ca te daśaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.1_0: chindhi srotaḥ parākramya kāmān praṇuda sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.1_1: na aprahāya muniḥ kāmān ekatvam adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.2_0: kurvāṇo hi sadā prājño dṛḍham eva parākramet /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.2_1: śithilā khalu pravrajyā hy ādadāti puno rajaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.3_0: yat kiṃcit śithilam karma saṃkliṣṭam vā api yat tapaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.3_1: apariśuddham brahmacaryam na tad bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.4_0: śaro yathā durgṛhīto hastam eva apakṛntati /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.5_0: śaro yathā sugṛhīto na hastam apakṛntati /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.5_1: śrāmaṇyam suparāmṛṣṭam nirvāṇasya eva so antike //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.6_0: duṣkaram dustitīkṣam ca śrāmaṇyam manda buddhinā / [dustitikṣam]
T07udanav_u:uv_11.6_1: bahavas tatra sambādhā yatra mando viṣīdati //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.7_0: śrāmaṇye carate yas tu sva cittam anivārayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.7_1: punaḥ punar viṣīdet sa saṃkalpānām vaśam gataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.8_1: duhkhā asamāna saṃvāsā duhkhāś ca upacitā bhavāḥ // [duhkhāsamāna saṃvāsā]
T07udanav_u:uv_11.9_0: kāṣāya kaṇṭhā bahavaḥ pāpa dharmā hy asamyatāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.9_1: pāpā hi karmabhiḥ pāpair ito gacchanti durgatim /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.10_0: yo asāv atyanta duhśīlaḥ sālavān mālutā yathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.10_1: karoty asau tathā ātmānam yathā enam dviṣad icchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.11_0: sthaviro na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā palitam śiraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.11_1: paripakvam vayas tasya moha jīrṇaḥ sa;ucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.12_0: yas tu puṇyam ca pāpam ca prahāya brahmacaryavān /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.13_0: na muṇḍa bhāvāt śramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtam vadan /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.13_1: icchā lobha samāpannaḥ śramaṇaḥ kim bhaviṣyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.14_0: na muṇḍa bhāvāt śramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtam vadan /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.14_1: śamitam yena pāpam syād aṇu sthūlam hi sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.14_2: śamitatvāt tu pāpānām śramaṇo hi nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_11.15_0: brāhmaṇo vāhitaiḥ pāpaiḥ śramaṇaḥ śamita aśubhaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_11.15_1: pravrājayitvā tu malān uktaḥ pravrajitas tv iha //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.1_0: ārya satyāni catvāri prajñayā paśyate yadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.1_1: eṣa mārgam prajānāti bhava tṛṣṇā pradālanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.2_0: uddhatam hi rajo vātair yathā vṛṣṭena śāmyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.2_1: evam śāmyanti saṃkalpāḥ prajñayā paśyate yadā //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.3_0: śreṣṭhā hi prajñā loke asmin yā iyam nirveda gāminī /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.3_1: yayā samyak prajānāti jāti maraṇa saṃkṣayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.4_0: mārgeṣv aṣṭa aṅgikaḥ śreṣṭhaś catvāry āryāṇi satyataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.4_1: śreṣṭho virāgo dharmāṇām cakṣuṣmān dvipadeṣu ca //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.5_0: anityān sarva saṃskārān prajñayā paśyate yadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.5_1: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.6_0: duhkham hi sarva saṃskārān prajñayā paśyate yadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.6_1: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.7_0: śunyataḥ sarva saṃskārān prajñayā paśyate yadā / [śūnyataḥ]
T07udanav_u:uv_12.7_1: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.8_1: atha nirvidyate duhkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.9_0: ākhyāto vo mayā mārgas tv ajñāyai śalya kṛntanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.9_1: yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam ākhyātāras tathā gatāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.10_0: deśito vo mayā mārgas tṛṣṇā śalya nikṛntanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.10_1: yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam deṣṭāro hi tathā gatāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.11_0: eṣo hi mārgo na asty anyo darśanasya viśuddhaye /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.12_0: eṣo añjaso hy eṣa ca vai parākrame tv eka ayano haṃsa patho yathā hrade /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.12_1: yam adhyagāt śākya muniḥ samāhitas tam eva ca ākhyāti gaṇeṣv abhīkṣṇaśaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.13_0: eka ayanam jāti jarā anta darśī mārgam vadaty eṣa hita anukampī /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.13_1: etena mārgeṇa hi tīrṇavantas tariṣyate ye prataranti ca ogham //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.14_0: atyanta niṣṭhāya damāya śuddhaye saṃsāra jātī maraṇa kṣayāya /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.14_1: aneka dhātu pratiṣaṃvidhāya mārgo hy ayam lokavidā prakāśitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.15_0: gaṅgā gatam yadvad apeta doṣam saṃsyandate vāri tu sāgareṇa /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.15_1: tathā eva mārgaḥ sugata pradeśitaḥ saṃsyandate ayam hy amṛtasya prāptaye //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.16_0: yo dharma cakram hy ananuśrutam purā prāvartayat sarva bhūta anukampī /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.16_1: tam tādṛśam deva nara agra sattvam nityam namasyeta bhavasya pāragam // [devanarāgrasatvam]
T07udanav_u:uv_12.17_0: sadā vitarkān kuśalān vitarkayet sadā punaś ca akuśalān vivarjayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.17_1: tato vitarkāṃś ca vicāritāni ca prahāsyate vṛṣṭir iva uddhatam rajaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.18_0: sa vai vitarka upaśamena cetasā spṛśeta sambodhi sukham hy anuttaram /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.18_1: śubham samādhim manasā nibandhayed vivekajam bhāvayitvā apramāṇam /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.18_2: pradālayitvā tribhir ālayāṃs trīn jahāti bandhān nipakaḥ pratismṛtaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.19_0: prajñā āyudho dhyāna bala upapetaḥ samāhito dhyāna rataḥ smṛta ātmā /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.19_1: lokasya buddhvā hy udaya vyayam ca vimucyate vedakaḥ sarvato asau //
T07udanav_u:uv_12.20_0: sukham sukha arthī labhate samācaran kīrtim samāpnoti yaśaś ca sarvataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_12.20_1: ya;āryam aṣṭa aṅgikam āñjasam śivam bhāvayati mārgam hy amṛtasya prāptaye //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.1_0: phalam vai kadalim hanti phalam veṇum phalam naḍam /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.1_1: satkāraḥ kāpuruṣam hanti sva garbho aśvatarīm yathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.2_0: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.2_1: hanti bālasya śukla aṃśam mūrdhānam ca asya pātayet //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.3_0: asanto lābham icchanti satkāram ca eva bhikṣuṣu /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.3_1: āvāseṣu ca mātsaryam pūjām para kuleṣu ca //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.4_0: mām eva nityam jānīyur gṛhī pravrajitas tathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.4_1: mama prativaśāś ca syuḥ kṛtya akṛtyeṣu keṣucit //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.5_1: anyā hi lābha upaniṣad anyā nirvāṇa gāminī //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.6_0: etaj jñātvā yathā bhūtam buddhānām śrāvakaḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.7_0: na vyāyameta sarvatra na anyeṣām puruṣo bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.7_1: na anyām nihśritya jīveta dharmeṇa na vaṇik caret //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.8_0: sva lābham na avamanyeta na anyeṣām spṛhako bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.8_1: anyeṣām spṛhako bhikṣuḥ samādhim na adhigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.9_0: sukham jīvitum icchet cet śrāmaṇya artheṣv avekṣavān /

T07udanav_u:uv_13.10_1: itaretareṇa saṃtuṣyed eka dharmam ca bhāvayet //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.11_0: sukham jīvitum icchet cet śrāmaṇya artheṣv avekṣavān /

T07udanav_u:uv_13.12_0: alpa jñāto api ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ /

T07udanav_u:uv_13.13_0: traividyaḥ syāt sa ced bhikṣur mṛtyu hantā nirāsravaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.13_1: alpa jñātam iti jñātvā hy avajānanty ajānakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.13a_0: sa ced bhavati traividyo mṛtyu hāyī nirāsravaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.13a_1: jñātvā alpa jñāta;iti tam avajānanty ajānakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.14_0: sa cet tv iha anna pānasya lābhī bhavati pudgalāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.14_1: pāpa dharmā api ced bhavati sa teṣām bhavati pūjitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.15_0: bahūn amitrān labhate saṃghāṭī prāvṛtaḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.15_1: lābhī yo hy anna pānasya vastra śayyā āsanasya ca //

T07udanav_u:uv_13.16_1: alpa jñāto hy anutsukaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
T07udanav_u:uv_13.17_0: na ayam anaśanena jīvate na āhāro hṛdayasya śāntaye /

T07udanav_u:uv_13.18_0: paṅkas tv iti yo hi vindate nityam vandana mānanā kule /
T07udanav_u:uv_13.18_1: sūkṣmaḥ śalyo duruddharaḥ satkāraḥ kāpuruṣeṇa dustyajaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.1_0: akruddhasya hi yaḥ krudhyet karma pāpam akurvataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.1_1: duhkham tam eva spṛśati loke asmiṃś ca paratra ca //

T07udanav_u:uv_14.3_0: hantāram labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati /

T07udanav_u:uv_14.5_0: pṛthak śabdāḥ samutpannās tam ca śreṣṭham iti manyathā / [pṛthak chabdāḥ]

T07udanav_u:uv_14.6_0: asthi chidām prāṇa hṛtām gava aśva dhana hāriṇām / [asthicchidām]

T07udanav_u:uv_14.6_2: yuṣmākam nu katham na syād imam dharmam vijānatām //

T07udanav_u:uv_14.7_0: paṇḍita ābhā parāmṛṣṭā vāg yā gocara bhāṣiṇī /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.7_1: vyāyacchanti mukham vāmā yayā nītā na te budhāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.8_0: pare hi na vijānanti vayam atra udyamāmahe /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.8_1: atra ye tu vijānanti teṣām śāmyanti medhakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.9_0: ākrośan mām avocan mām ayojan mām ajāpayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.9_1: atra ye hy upanahyanti vairam teṣām na śāmyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.10_0: ākrośan mām avocan mām ajayan mām ajāpayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.10_1: atra ye na upanahyanti vairam teṣām praśāmyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.11_0: na hi vaireṇa vairāṇi śāmyanti iha kadācana /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.11_1: kṣāntyā vairāṇi śāmyanti eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.12_0: vairam na vaireṇa hi jātu śāmyet śāmyed avaireṇa tu vaira bhāvaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.12_1: vaira prasaṅgo hy ahitāya dṛṣṭas tasmādd hi vairam na karoti vidvān //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.13_0: sa cel labhed vai nipakam sahāyam loke caran sādhu hi nityam eva /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.13_1: abhibhūya sarvāṇi parisravāṇi careta tena āpta manā smṛta ātmā //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.14_0: no cel labhed vai nipakam sahāyam loke caran sādhu hi nityam eva /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.14_1: rājā iva rāṣṭram vipluam prahāya ekaś caren na ca pāpāni kuryāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.15_0: caraṃś ca na adhigaccheta sahāyam tulyam ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.15_1: eka caryām dṛḍham kuryān na asti bāle sahāyatā //
T07udanav_u:uv_14.16_0: ekasya caritam śreyo na tu bālaḥ sahāyakaḥ /

T07udanav_u:uv_14.16_a_0: ekasya caritam śreyo na tu bāla sahāyatā /
T07udanav_u:uv_14.16_a_1: alpa utsukaś cared eko mātaṅga araṇye nāgavat //
T07udanav_u:uv_15.1_2: sa;imam bhāsate lokam abhra muktaiva candramāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_15.2_0: sthitena kāyena tathaiva cetasā sthito niṣaṇṇo apy athavā śayānaḥ /

T07udanav_u:uv_15.3_0: smṛtiḥ kāya gatā nityam saṃvaraś ca indriyaiḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_15.3_1: samāhitaḥ sa jānīyāt tena nirvāṇam ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_15.4_0: yasya syāt sarvataḥ smṛtiḥ satatam kāya gatā hy upasthitā /
T07udanav_u:uv_15.4_1: no ca syān no ca me syān na bhaviṣyati na ca me bhaviṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_15.4_2: anupūrva vihāravān asau kālena uttarate viṣaktikām //

T07udanav_u:uv_15.7_0: jāgarantaḥ śṛṇudhvam me suptāś ca pratibudhyata /
T07udanav_u:uv_15.7_1: supteṣu jāgaram śreyā na hi jāgarato bhayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_15.8_1: amṛtam ca adhimuktānām astam gacchanti āsravāḥ //

T07udanav_u:uv_15.9_1: yeṣām divā ca rātrau ca nityam buddha gatā smṛtiḥ //

T07udanav_u:uv_15.10_1: yeṣām divā ca rātrau ca nityam dharma gatā smṛtiḥ //

T07udanav_u:uv_15.11_1: yeṣām divā ca rātrau ca nityam saṃgha gatā smṛtiḥ //

T07udanav_u:uv_16.1_0: pūrvam hi kṛtyam pratijāgareta mā me kṛtyam kṛtya kāle vihanyāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.1_1: tam nitya kāle pratiyatya kāriṇam na eva kṛtyam kṛtya kāle vihanti //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.2_0: vyāyameta eva puruṣo yāvad arthasya niṣpadaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.2_1: paśyed asau tathā ātma artham yathā eva icchet tathā bhavet //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.3_1: karmāro rajatasya eva haradhvam malam ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.3_2: nirdhānta malā hy anaṅgaṇā na punar jāti jarām upeṣyatha //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.4_1: abhaye bhaya darśīno bhaye ca abhaya darśinaḥ / [bhaya darśino]
T07udanav_u:uv_16.4_2: mithyā dṛṣṭi samādānāt sattvā gacchanti durgatim //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.5_0: yas tu pūrvam pramādya iha paścād vai na pramādyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.5_1: sa;imam bhāsate lokam abhra muktaiva candramāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.6_0: yas tu pūrvam pramādya iha paścād vai na pramādyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.7_0: daharo api cet pravrajate yujyate buddha śāsane /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.7_1: sa;imam bhāsate lokam abhra muktaiva candramāḥ //

T07udanav_u:uv_16.11_0: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇa ante ca sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.11_1: sa vai dṛṣṭa pado dhīro maraṇa ante na śocati //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.12_0: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇa ante ca sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.12_1: sa vai dṛṣṭa pado dhīraḥ śoka madhye na śocati //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.13_0: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇa ante ca sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.13_1: sa vai dṛṣṭa pado dhīro jñāti madhye virocate //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.14_0: kṛṣṇān dharmān viprahāya śuklān bhāvayata bhikṣavaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.14_2: tatra ca abhirameta āryo hitvā kāmān akiṃcanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.15_0: śuddhasya hi sadā phalguḥ śuddhasya poṣathaḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.15_1: śuddhasya śuci karmaṇaḥ sadā sampadyate vratam //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.16_0: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇa doṣāṇi rāga doṣā tv iyam prajā /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.16_1: tasmād vigata rāgebhyo dattam bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.17_0: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇa doṣāṇi dveṣa doṣā tv iyam prajā /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.17_1: tasmād vigata dveṣebhyo dattam bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.18_0: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇa doṣāṇi moha doṣā tv iyam prajā /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.18_1: tasmād vigata mohebhyo dattam bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.19_0: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇa doṣāṇi māna doṣā tv iyam prajā /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.19_1: tasmād vigata mānebhyo dattam bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.20_0: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇa doṣāṇi lobha doṣā tv iyam prajā /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.20_1: tasmād vigata lobhebhyo dattam bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.21_0: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇa doṣāṇi tṛṣṇā doṣā tv iyam prajā /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.21_1: tasmād vigata tṛṣṇebhyo dattam bhavati mahā phalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.22_1: arakte virajā bhavati rakte bālo nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.23_0: nagaram hy asthi prākāram māṃsa śoṇita lepanam /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.23_1: yatra rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca māno ṃrakṣaś ca bādhyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_16.24_0: hetu prabhavam sadā hi duhkham tad apaśyan sa hi tena tatra baddhaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_16.24_1: tasya tu samayāj jahāti saṅgam na hi bāhyā prajahanti tam mahaugham // [mahā ogham]
T07udanav_u:uv_17.1_0: smṛtimantaḥ prayujyante na nikete ramanti te /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.1_1: haṃsavat palvalam hitvā hy okam ogham jahante te // [jahanti te]
T07udanav_u:uv_17.2_0: haṃsā āditya pathe yānti ākāśe jīvita indriyāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.2_1: niryānti dhīrā lokān māra sainyam pramathya te //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.3_1: jīrṇa krauñcaiva dhyāyante alpa matsya;iva palvale //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.4_1: śenti cāpāti kīrṇā vā paurāṇāny anucintitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.5_0: na alpam manyeta pāpasya na etam mām āgamiṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.5_1: uda bindu nipātena mahā kumbho api pūryate /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.5_2: pūryanti bālāḥ pāpair hi stoka stokam kṛtair api //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.6_0: na alpam manyeta puṇyasya na etam mām āgamiṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.6_1: uda bindu nipātena mahā kumbho api pūryate /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.6_2: pūryanti dhīrāḥ puṇyair hi stoka stokam kṛtair api //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.7_0: ye taranty ārṇavam nityam kolam baddhvā janāḥ śubham /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.7_1: na te taranti saritām tīrṇā medhāvino janāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.8_0: uttīrṇo bhagavān buddhaḥ sthale tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.8_1: bhikṣavaḥ snānti caiva atra kolam badhnanti ca apare //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.9_0: kim kuryād uda pānena yatra āpaḥ sarvato bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.9_1: tṛṣṇāyā mūlam uddhṛtya kasya paryeṣaṇām caret //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.10_0: udakena nijanti nejakā;iṣu kārā namayanti tejasā /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.10_1: dārum namayanti takṣakā hy ātmānam damayanti paṇḍitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.11_0: yathā hradaḥ sugambhīro viprasanno hy anāvilaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.11_1: evam śrutvā hi saddharmam viprasīdanti paṇḍitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_17.12_0: pṛthivī sadṛśo na lipyate tāyī kīlavad aprakampayaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_17.12_1: hrada;iva hi vinīta kardamo niṣkaluṣā hi bhavanti paṇḍitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_18.1_0: ka;imām pṛthivīm vijeṣyate yama lokam ca tathā sadevakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_18.1_1: ko dharma padam sudeśitam kuśalaḥ puṣpam iva praceṣyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_18.2_0: śaikṣaḥ pṛthivīm vijeṣyate yama lokam ca tathā sadevakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_18.2_1: sa hi dharma padam sudeśitam kuśalaḥ puṣpam iva praceṣyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_18.3_0: vanam chindata mā vṛkṣam vanād vai jāyate bhayam /

T07udanav_u:uv_20.1_0: krodham jahed viprajahec ca mānam samyojanam sarvam atikrameta /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.1_1: tam nāmne rūpe ca;asajyamānam akiṃcanam na anupatanti saṃgāḥ //

T07udanav_u:uv_20.11_0: ubhayoś carate so artham ātmanasya parasya ca /

T07udanav_u:uv_20.12_0: ubha arthe caramāṇam tam hy ātmanasya parasya ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.13_0: jayam hi manyate bālo vacobhiḥ paruṣair vadan /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.13_1: nityam iva jayas tasya yo ativākyam titīkṣati // [titikṣati]
T07udanav_u:uv_20.14_0: śreṣṭhasya vākyam kṣamate bhayena saṃrambha hetoḥ sadṛśasya caiva /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.14_1: yo vai nihīnasya vacaḥ kṣameta tām uttamām kṣāntim iha āhur āryāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_20.15_0: kruddho vācam na bhāṣeta pariṣatsv atha vā mithaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.15_1: krodha abhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ svam artham hi na budhyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_20.16_0: satyam vaden na ca krudhyed dadyād alpād api svayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.16_1: sthānair ebhis tribhir yukto devānām antikam vrajet //
T07udanav_u:uv_20.17_0: śāntasya hi kutaḥ krodho dāntasya sama jīvinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.17_1: samyag ājñā vimuktasya krodho na asti prajānataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_20.18_0: tasya eva pāpam bhavati yaḥ kruddhe krudhyate punaḥ /

T07udanav_u:uv_20.19_0: akrodhena jayet krodham asādhum sādhunā jayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_20.19_1: jayet kadaryam dānena satyena tv anṛtam jayet //

T07udanav_u:uv_20.21_0: akrodhaś ca avihiṃsā ca vasaty āryeṣu sarvadā /

T07udanav_u:uv_20.22_1: vadāmi sārathim tam tu raśmi grāho ayam anyathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_20_23_1: śramaṇo mārga satkāro droha smṛti prakīrṇakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_20_23_2: udakam puṣpam aśvaś ca saha krodhena te daśaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.1_0: sarva abhibhūḥ sarvavid eva ca asmi sarvaiś ca dharmaiḥ satatam na liptaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.1_1: sarvam jahaḥ sarva bhayād vimuktaḥ svayam hy abhijñāya kam uddiśeyam //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.2_0: kam uddiśeyam tv asamo hy atulyaḥ svayam pravaktā hy adhigamya bodhim /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.2_1: tathāgato deva manuṣya śāstā sarvajñatām prāpya balair upetaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.3_0: aham hi lokeṣv arahann aham lokeṣv anuttaraḥ sadevakeṣu lokeṣu ca aham māra abhibhūr jinaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.4_0: ācāryo me na vai kaścit sadṛśas ca na vidyate /

T07udanav_u:uv_21.5_0: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā hy āsrava kṣayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.5_1: jitā me pāpakā dharmās tato aham upagā jinaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.7_0: na hi santaḥ prakāśyante viditvā loka paryāyam /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.8_0: nadanti iha mahā vīraḥ sad dharmeṇa tathāgatāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.8_1: dharmeṇa nadamānānām ke tv asūyed vijānakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.9_0: ye dhyāna prasṛtā dhīrā naiṣkramya upaśame ratāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.9_1: devā api spṛhayanty eṣām buddhānām śrīmatām sadā //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.10_0: teṣām devā manuṣyāś ca sambuddhānām yaśasvinām /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.10_1: spṛhayanty āśu buddhīnām śarīra antima dhāriṇām //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.11_0: ye ca abhyatītāḥ sambuddhā ye ca buddhā hy anāgatāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.11_1: yaś ca apy etarhi sambuddho bahūnām śoka nāśakaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.12_0: sarve sad dharma guravo vyāhārṣu viharanti ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.13_0: tasmād iha ātma kāmena māhātmyam abhikāṅkṣatā /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.13_1: sad dharmo guru kartavyaḥ smaratā buddha śāsanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.14_0: na śraddhāsyanti vai ye tu narā buddhasya śāsanam /
T07udanav_u:uv_21.14_1: vyasanam te gamiṣyanti vaṇijo rākṣasīṣv iva //
T07udanav_u:uv_21.15_0: śraddhāsyanti tu ye nityam narā buddhasya śāsanam /

T07udanav_u:uv_25.8_0: tagaram palāśa pattreṇa yo naro hy upanahyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.8_1: pattrāṇy api sugandhīni sad evam saṃgamāt satām //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.9_1: śaṅkito bhavati pāpasya avarṇaś ca asya vardhate //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.10_0: saṃsevamānaḥ pāpo hi saṃspṛṣṭaḥ saṃspṛśet parān /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.10_2: upalepa bhayād dhīro na eva pāpa sakhā bhavet //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.11_0: yādṛśam kurute mitram yādṛśam ca upasevate /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.11_1: na cirāt tādṛśo bhavati saṃsevā hy asya tādṛśī //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.12_0: tasmāt phala puṭasya eva dṛṣṭvā sampākam ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.12_1: asanto na upaseveta santaḥ seveta paṇḍitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.13_0: yāvaj jīvam pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitān paryupāsate /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.13_1: na sa dharmam vijānāti darvī sūpa rasān iva //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.14_1: sa vai dharmam vijānāti jihvā sūpa rasān iva //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.15_0: yāvaj jīvam pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitān paryupāsate /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.15_1: na sa dharmam vijānāti prajñā hy asya na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.16_1: sa vai dharmam vijānāti prajñā tasya hi vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.17_0: yāvaj jīvam pi cet bālaḥ paṇḍitān paryupāsate /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.17_1: na sa dharmam vijānāti samyak sambuddha deśitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.18_1: sa vai dharmam vijānāti samyak sambuddha deśitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.19_0: ekam artha padam proktam paṇḍitasya artha kārakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.19_1: bālasya tu na kṛtyāya syāt sarvam buddha bhāṣitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.20_0: bālaḥ pada sahasreṇa padam ekam na budhyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.20_1: padena ekena medhāvī padānām vindate śatam //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.21_0: amitraḥ paṇḍitaḥ śreyān na tu bālo anukampakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.22_0: yo jānīyād aham bāla;iti bālaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.22_1: bālaḥ paṇḍita mānī tu bāla;eva nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.23_0: yac ca bālaḥ praśaṃseta yac ca nindeta paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.23_1: nindā tu paṇḍitāt śreṣṭhā na tu bālāt praśaṃsanā //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.24_0: bālam na paśyet śṛṇuyān na ca no tena saṃvaset /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.24_1: duhkho bālair hi saṃvāso hy amitreṇa eva sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.24_2: dhīrais tu sukha saṃvāso jñātīnām iva saṃgamaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_25.25_0: dhīram prājñam niṣeveta śīlavantam bahu śrutam /
T07udanav_u:uv_25.25_1: dhaureyam java sampannam candram tārā gaṇā;iva // [dhaireyam]?
T07udanav_u:uv_26.1_0: kūrmo yathā aṅgāni svake kapāle samādadhīta ātma vitarkitāni /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.1_1: anihśrito hy anyam aheṭhayānaḥ parinirvṛto na apavadeta kaṃcit //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.2_0: kṣāntiḥ paramam tapas titīkṣā nirvāṇam paramam vadanti buddhāḥ / [titikṣā]
T07udanav_u:uv_26.2_1: na hi pravrajitaḥ para upatāpī śramaṇo bhavati param viheṭhayan vai //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.3_0: mā kaṃcit paruṣam brūthaḥ proktāḥ prativadanti tam /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.3_1: duhkhā hi saṃrambha kathāḥ pratidaṇḍam spṛśanti hi //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.4_0: yad īrayasi ha ātmānam kaṃsī iva upahatā sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.4_1: jāti maraṇa saṃsāram ciram hy anubhaviṣyasi //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.5_0: na tv īrayasi ha ātmānam kaṃsir na upahatā yathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.5_1: eṣa prāpto asi nirvāṇam saṃrambhas te na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.6_0: ārogya paramā lābhā saṃtuṣṭi paramam dhanam /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.6_1: viśvāsa paramam mitram nirvāṇa paramam sukham //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.7_0: kṣudhā parama rogāṇām saṃskārā duhkham eva tu / [paramā]?
T07udanav_u:uv_26.7_1: etaj jñātvā yathā bhūtam nirvāṇa paramo bhavet //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.8_0: alpakāḥ sugatim yānti bahavo yānti durgatim //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.8_1: etaj jñātvā yathā bhūtam nirvāṇa paramo bhavet //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.9_0: sahetum sugatim yānti sahetum yānti durgatim /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.9_1: sahetum parinirvānti hy evam etat sahetukam //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.10_0: gatir mṛgāṇām pravaṇam ākāśam pakṣiṇām gatiḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.10_1: dharmo gatir vibhāgīnām nirvāṇam tv arhatām gatiḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.11_0: na hi idam hīna vīryeṇa mandena apy avijānatā /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.11_1: nirvāṇam śakyam adhigantum sarva grantha pradālanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.12_0: siñca bhikṣor imām nāvam siktā laghvī bhaviṣyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.12_1: hitvā rāgam ca doṣam ca tato nirvāṇam eṣyasi //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.13_0: abhūt pūrve tato na abhūn na abhūt pūrve tato hy abhūt /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.13_1: na ca abhūn na bhaviṣyati na vā apy etarhi vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.14_1: tṛṣṇā kṣayam paśyato hi duhkhasya anto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.15_0: chittvā tṛṣṇām praśāmya iha rajaḥ sarvam samāhitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.16_0: bhittvā kāyam ca saṃjñām ca vedanām vyupaśāmya ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.16_1: vijñāna asta gamam labdhvā duhkhasya anto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.17_0: dṛṣṭe tu dṛṣṭa mātreṇa śrute ca śruta mātratā /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.17_1: mate tathaiva vijñāte duhkhasya anto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.18_0: ene meme tathā dapphe daḍapphe ca iti budhyataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.18_1: sarvasmād viratiḥ pāpād duhkhasya anto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.19_0: māśā tuṣā saṃśamā ca sarvatra viraḍī tathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.19_1: sarvasmād viratiḥ pāpād duhkhasya anto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.20_0: anihśritasya acalitam prasrabdhiś ca iha vidyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.20_1: na gatir na cyutiś caiva duhkhasya anto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.21_0: ajāte sati jātasya vaden nihsaraṇam sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.22_0: jātam bhūtam samutpannam kṛtam saṃskṛtam adhruvam /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.22_1: jarā maraṇa saṃghātam moṣa dharma pralopanam /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.22_2: āhāra netrī prabhavam na alam tad abhinanditum //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.23_0: tasya nihhsaraṇam śāntam atarka avacaram padam / [atarkāvacaram]
T07udanav_u:uv_26.23_1: nirodho duhkha dharmāṇām saṃskāra upaśamam sukham //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.24_0: abhijānāmy aham sthānam yatra bhūtam na vidyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.24_1: na ākāśam na ca vijñānam na sūryaś candramā na ca //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.25_0: na eva agatir na ca gatir na upapattiś cyutir na ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.25_1: apratiṣṭham anālambam duhkha antaḥ sa nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.26_0: yatra na āpo na pṛthivī tejo vāyur na gāhate /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.26_1: na tatra śuklā dyotanti tamas tatra na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.27_0: na tatra candramā bhāti na ādityo vai prakāśyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.27_1: yathā tv iha ātmanā vetti munir mauneyam ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.27_2: atha rūpād arūpāc ca sarva duhkhāt pramucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.28_0: niṣṭhā gato hy asaṃtrāsī na vikanthī na kaukṛtiḥ / [vikaṇṭhī]?
T07udanav_u:uv_26.28_1: acchettā bhava śalyānām antimo asya samucchrayaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.29_0: eṣā hi paramā niṣṭhā śāntam padam anuttaram /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.29_1: kṣayaḥ sarva nimittānām pradāna padam acyutam //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.30_0: tulyam atulyam ca sambhavam bhava saṃskāram avāsṛjan muniḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.30_1: ādhyātma rataḥ samāhito hy abhinat kośam iva aṇḍa sambhavam //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.31_0: jayate dānam dharma dānam ca sarvam jayate ratim dharma ratiṃś ca sarvām /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.31_1: jayate balam kṣānti balam ca sarvam jayate sukham sarva tṛṣṇā nirodhaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_26.31_a_0: sarvam dānam dharma dānam jināti sarvām ratim dharma ratim jināti /
T07udanav_u:uv_26.31_a_1: sarvam balam kṣānti balam jināti tṛṣṇā kṣayaḥ sarva sukham jināti //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.1_0: supaśyam para vadyam syād ātma vadyam tu durdṛśam /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.1_1: paraḥ parasya vadyāni tu utpunāti busam yathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.2_0: para vadya anudarśino nitya avadhyāna saṃjñinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.2_1: vāmā dharmāḥ pravardhante sa hy ārād dharma darśanāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.3_0: ahrīkena sujīvam syāt kāka śūreṇa dhvāṅkṣiṇā /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.3_1: praskandinā pragalbhena saṃkliṣṭam tv iha jīvate //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.4_0: hrīmatā tv iha durjīvam nityam śuci gaveṣiṇā /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.5_0: andha bhūto hy ayam lokas tanuko atra vipaśyataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.5_1: śakunto jāla muktaiva hy alpam svargeṣu modate //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.6_0: moṣa sambandhano loko bhavya rūpa;iva dṛśyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.6_2: asat sad iva dṛśyate paśyato na asti kiṃcanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.7_0: aham kāra sṛtā martyāḥ para kāra upasaṃhitāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.7_1: etad eke na jānanti paśyanti na hi śalyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.8_0: etat tu śalyam pratiyatya paśyato hy adhyavasitā yatra prajāḥ prasaktāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.8_1: aham karomi iti na tasya hiṃsyāt paraḥ karoti iti na tasya hiṃsyāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.9_0: māna upeto hy ayam loko māna saktaḥ sadā sthitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.9_1: dṛṣṭibhiś caiva saṃrabdhaḥ saṃsāram na ativartate //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.10_0: yat prāptam yac ca prāptavyam rajaḥ kīrṇam idam dvayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.10_1: āturyam iti tam jñātvā jahyād vidvān samāhitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.11_0: śikṣā sārāś ca ye sattvā jīvino brahma jīvinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.11_1: upasthāna rataye ca sa;eko antaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.12_0: bhoktavyāḥ śucayaḥ kāmā na doṣas teṣu vidyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.12_1: ya;evam darśino bālā dvitīyo antaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.13_0: etāv antāv anajñāya tv atilīyanti bāliśaḥ /  [anajñāya]?
T07udanav_u:uv_27.13_1: apare tv atidhāvanti cakṣuṣmāṃs tām prapaśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.14_0: etāv antau viditvā tu na abhavaṃs tatra ye budhāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.14_1: na caiva tena manyante vartmas teṣām na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.15_0: yathā budbudikām paśyed yathā paśyen marīcikām /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.15_1: evam lokam avekṣam vai mṛtyu rājam na paśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.16_0: yathā budbudikām paśyed yathā paśyen marīcikām /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.16_1: evam kāyam avekṣam vai mṛtyu rājam na paśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.17_0: paśyata imam sadā kāyam citram rāja ratha upamam /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.17_1: yatra bālāḥ pramuhyante saṅgo na asti prajānatām //

T07udanav_u:uv_27.17a_1: yatra bālā viṣīdanti paṇḍito atra virajyate //

T07udanav_u:uv_27.18_1: yatra bālā viṣīdanti yathā paṅke jaradgavaḥ //

T07udanav_u:uv_27.19_1: yatra bālāḥ pramuhyante paṇḍito atra virajyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.20_0: paśya citra kṛtam bimbam arukam kāya saṃjñitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.20_1: āturam moṣa saṃkalpam yasya na asti dhruva sthitiḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.21_0: paśya citra kṛtam bimbam maṇibhiḥ kuṇḍalais tathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.21_1: alam bālasya mohāya na tu pāra gaveṣiṇām //

T07udanav_u:uv_27.23_0: aṣṭāpadī kṛtāḥ keśā netre ca añjana rañjite /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.23_1: alam bālasya mohāya na tu pāra gaveṣiṇām //

T07udanav_u:uv_27.24_1: alam bālasya mohāya paṇḍito atra virajyate //

T07udanav_u:uv_27.27_0: kāmeṣu saktāḥ satatam hi mūḍhāḥ samyojane vadyam apaśyamānāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.27_1: na jātu samyojana saṅga saktā hy ogham tareyur vipulam mahāntam //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.28_0: ūrdhvam ca adhaḥ sarvato vīta rāgo hy ayam aham asmi iti ca na anupaśyan /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.28_1: evam vimukto hi tared iha ogham atīrṇa pūrvam hy apunar bhavāya //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.29_0: yo nirvanagair vimokṣitaḥ saṃvana mukto vanam eva dhāvati /  [nirvanagair]?
T07udanav_u:uv_27.29_1: tam paśyatha pudgalam tv imam mukto bandhanam eva dhāvati //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.30_0: nelāṅgaḥ śveta saṃchanna;ekāro vartate rathaḥ / [nīla aṅgaḥ]?
T07udanav_u:uv_27.30_1: anigham paśyata āyāntam chinna yoktram abandhanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.31_0: bahavaḥ śaraṇam yānti parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.31_1: ārāmām vṛkṣa caityāṃś ca manuṣyā bhaya tarjitāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.32_0: na etadd hi śaraṇam kṣemam na etat śaraṇam uttamam /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.32_1: na etat śaraṇam āgamya sarva duhkhāt pramucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.33_0: yas tu buddham ca dharmam ca saṃgham ca śaraṇam gataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.33_1: catvāri ca ārya satyāni prajñayā paśyate yadā //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.34_1: āryam ca aṣṭa aṅgikam mārgam duhkha upaśama gāminam //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.35_0: etadd hi śaraṇam kṣemam etat śaraṇam uttamam /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.35_1: etat śaraṇam āgamya sarva duhkhāt pramucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.36_0: paśyataḥ paśyate paśyam paśyate ca apy apaśyataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.36_1: apaśyan paśyate na eva paśyato na apy apaśyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.37_0: anupaśyanayā ca paśyanā nānātvam hi tayor iha ucyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.37_1: divasasya yathā eva rātribhiḥ saṃdhānam ca tayor na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.38_0: anupaśyati cen na paśyati tv atha cet paśyati na anupaśyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.38_1: paśyann ayam na anupaśyati tv anupaśyaṃs tu sadā na paśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.39_0: paśyan nu kim na anupaśyate kim apaśyan na anupaśyate sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.39_1: kasmin sati ha anupaśyanā kasmin na sati na anupaśyanā //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.40_0: duhkham yad ayam na paśyati tad apaśyann ātmā iti paśyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.40_1: duhkham tu yathā tathā prapaśyann ayam ātmā iti sadā anupaśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_27.41_0: yena āvṛtaḥ pṛthag janaḥ saṃskārān duhkham na paśyati /
T07udanav_u:uv_27.41_1: tasmin sati ha anupaśyanā vigate asmin vigata anupaśyanā //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.1_1: sva citta paryavadanam etad buddhasya śāsanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.2_0: dadataḥ puṇyam pravardhate vairam na kriyate ca samyamāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.2_1: kuśalī prajahāti pāpakam rāga doṣa moha kṣayāt tu nirvṛtiḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.3_0: sārdham carann ekakaḥ sadā miśro hy anya janena vedakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.3_1: kuśalī prajahāti pāpakam krauñcaḥ kṣīrapako yathā udakam //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.4_0: dṛṣṭvā hy ādīnavam loke jñātvā dharma niraupadhim /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.4_1: āryo na ramate pāpe pāpo na ramate śubhe //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.5_0: praviveka rasam jñātvā rasam ca upaśamasya vai /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.5_1: nirjvaro bhavati niṣpāpo dharma prīti rasam piban //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.6_1: puṇya pāpa prahīṇasya na asti durgatito bhayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.7_0: niṣeddhāram pravaktāram yaj jāned vadya darśinam /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.7_1: nigṛhya vādinam dhīram tādṛśam satatam bhajet /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.7_2: tādṛśam bhajamānasya śreyo bhavati na pāpakam //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.8_0: upaśānto hy uparato manda bhāṣī hy anuddhataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.8_1: dhunāti pāpakān dharamān druma pattram yathā anilaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.9_0: yo hy apraduṣṭasya narasya duṣyate śuddhasya nityam vigata aṅgaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.9_1: tam eva bālam pratiyāti pāpam kṣiptam rajaḥ prativātam yathaiva //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.10_0: yad yat karoti puruṣas tat tat paśyati ha ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.10_1: kalyāṇa kārī kalyāṇam pāpa kārī ca pāpakam //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.11_0: ātmanā hi kṛte pāpe tv ātmanā kliśyate sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.11_1: ātmanā tv akṛte pāpe hy ātmanā eva viśudhyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.12_0: aśuddha buddhim pratyātmam na anyo hy anyam viśodhayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.12_1: abhimathnāti tam pāpam vajram aśma maṇim yathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.13_1: paṇḍito jīva loke asmin pāpāni parivarjayet //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.14_0: vaṇig vā sabhayam mārgam alpa śāstro mahā dhano /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.14_1: viṣam jīvita kāmo vā pāpāni parivarjayet //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.15_0: paṇau ca asya vraṇo na syād dhārayet pāṇinā viṣam /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.15_1: na avraṇe krāmati viṣam na asti pāpam akurvataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.16_0: sukarāṇi hy asādhūni sva ātmano hy ahitāni ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.16_1: yad vai hitam ca pathyam ca tad vai parama duṣkaram //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.17_0: sukaram sādhunā sādhu sādhu pāpena duṣkaram /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.17_1: pāpam pāpena sukaram pāpam āryeṇa duṣkaram //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.18_0: madhuvad manyate bālo yāvat pāpam na pacyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.18_1: yadā tu pacyate pāpam atha duhkham nigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.19_0: pāpo api paśyate bhadram yāvat pāpam na pacyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.19_1: yadā tu pacyate pāpam atha pāpāni paśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.20_0: bhadro api paśyate pāpam yāvad bhadram na pacyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.20_1: yadā tu pacyate bhadram atha bhadrāṇi paśyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.21_0: kuryāc cet puruṣaḥ pāpam na enam kuryāt punaḥ punaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.21_1: na tatra chandam kurvīta duhkham pāpasya saṃcayaḥ // [cchandam]
T07udanav_u:uv_28.22_0: kuryāt tu puruṣaḥ puṇyam kuryāc ca enam punaḥ punaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.22_1: tatra chandam ca kurvīta sukham puṇyasya saṃcayaḥ / [cchandam]
T07udanav_u:uv_28.23_1: dhandham hi kurvataḥ puṇyam pāpeṣu ramate manaḥ // [dvandvam]?
T07udanav_u:uv_28.24_0: alpakam pi kṛtam pāpam duhkhāya parataḥ sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.24_1: mahate bhavaty anarthāya viṣam koṣṭha gatam yathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.25_0: alpakam pi kṛtam puṇyam para loke sukhāvaham /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.25_1: arthāya mahate nityam sasyānām iva saṃcayaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.26_0: adaṇḍeṣu hi daṇḍena yo apraduṣṭeṣu duṣyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.26_1: daśānām anyatamam sthānam kṣipram eva nigacchati //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.27_0: jñātīnām vā vinā bhāvam bhogānām vā parikṣayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.27_1: rājato hy upasargam vā apy abhyākhyānam ca dāruṇam //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.28_0: vedanām kaṭukām vā api śarīrasya ca bhedanam/
T07udanav_u:uv_28.28_1: ābādham vā api paruṣam citta kṣepam atha api vā //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.29_0: atha vā asya apy agārāṇi hy agnir dahati sarvathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.29_1: bhedāt kāyasya ca aprājño daśamām durgatim vrajet //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.30_0: pāpe tu kṛte hi na āśvasec cira kṛte dūra kṛte api na āśvaset /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.30_1: rahasi ca kṛte api na āśvased asti tasya vipāka;iti na āśvaset //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.31_0: puṇye tu kṛte tv iha āśvasec cira kṛte dūra kṛte api ca āśvaset /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.31_1: rahasi ca kṛte api ca āśvased asti tasya vipāka;iti ca āśvaset //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.32_0: pāpe tu kṛte hi śocate cira kṛte dūra kṛte api śocate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.32_1: rahasi ca kṛte api śocate asti tasya vipāka;iti śocate //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.33_0: puṇye tu kṛte hi nandate cira kṛte dūra kṛte api nandate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.33_1: rahasi ca kṛte api nandate asti tasya vipāka;iti nandate //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.34_0: iha śocati pretya śocati pāpa karmā hy ubhayatra śocati /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.34_1: sa hi śocati sa praśocati dṛṣṭvā karma hi kliṣṭam ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.35_0: iha nandati pretya nandati kṛta puṇyo hy ubhayatra nandati /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.35_1: sa hi nandati sa pramodate dṛṣṭvā karma viśuddham ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.36_0: pāpe tu kṛte hi śocate cira kṛte dūra kṛte api śocate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.36_1: rahasi ca kṛte api śocate bhūyaḥ śocati durgatim gataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.37_0: puṇye tu kṛte hi nandate cira kṛte dūra kṛte api nandate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.37_1: rahasi ca kṛte api nandate bhūyo nandati sadgatim gataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.38_0: puṇye tu kṛte hi modate cira kṛte dūra kṛte api modate /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.38_1: rahasi ca kṛte api modate bhūyo modati sadgatim gataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.39_0: kṛte ca pāpe apy akṛte ca puṇye dharmam samādāya vihāya dharmam /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.39_1: bibheti mṛtyor iha pāpa karmā bhinna plavo madhya;iva udakasya //
T07udanav_u:uv_28.40_0: kṛtam ca puṇyam hy akṛtam ca pāpam satām ca dharmaś caritaḥ purāṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_28.40_1: bibheti mṛtyor na kadaṃcid eva yathaiva nāvā dṛḍhayā tarantaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.1_0: avabhāsati tāvat sa kṛmir yāvan na udayate divā karaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.1_1: vairocane tu udgate bhṛśam śyāvo bhavati na ca avabhāsate //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.2_0: evam bhāṣitam āsi tārkikair yāvan na udayate tathā gataḥ / [āsi]?
T07udanav_u:uv_29.2_1: buddha pratibhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsati na asya śrāvakaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.3_0: asāre sāra matayaḥ sāre ca asāra saṃjñinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.3_1: te sāram na adhigacchanti mithyā saṃkalpa gocarāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.4_0: sāram tu sārato jñātvā hy asāram ca apy asārataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.4_1: te sāram adhigacchanti samyak saṃkalpa gocarāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.5_0: upa atidhāvanti hi sāra buddhyā navam navam bandhanam ādadantaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.5_1: patanti hi dyotam iva andha kārād dṛṣṭte śrute caiva niviṣṭa cittāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.6_0: kāṅkṣā hi yā syād iha vā pṛthag vā iha vedikā vā para vedikā vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.6_1: tām dhyāyino viprajahanti sarvā hy ātāpino brahmacaryam carantaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.7_1: apeta dama sauratyo na asau kāṣāyam arhati //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.8_0: yas tu vānta kaṣāyaḥ syāt śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.8_1: upeta dama sauratyaḥ sa vai kāṣāyam arhati //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.9_0: yasya doṣāḥ samucchinnās tāla mastakavad dhatāḥ / [hatāḥ]
T07udanav_u:uv_29.9_1: sa vānta doṣo medhāvī sādhu rūpo nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.10_0: na nāma rūpa mātreṇa varṇa puṣkalayā na ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.10_1: sādhu rūpo naro bhavati māyāvī matsarī śaṭhaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.11_0: na varṇa rūpeṇa naro hi sarvo vijñāyate netvara darśanena /?
T07udanav_u:uv_29.11_1: susaṃvṛtānām iha vyañjanena tv asaṃvṛtā lokam imam caranti //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.12_0: pratirūpakam dhūpita karṇikā vā loha ardha māṣa;iva hiraṇyac channaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.12_1: caranti ha eke parivāravantas tv antar hy aśuddhā bahi śobhamānāḥ / [bahiḥ śobhamānāḥ]
T07udanav_u:uv_29.13_0: middhī ca yo bhavati mahā grasaś ca rātrim divam samparivarta śāyī /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.13_1: mahā varāhaiva nivāpa puṣṭaḥ punaḥ punar mandam upaiti garbham //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.14_0: manujasya sadā smṛtīmato labdhvā bhojana mātra jānataḥ / [smṛtimato]
T07udanav_u:uv_29.14_1: tanukā asya bhavanti vedanāḥ śanakair jīryati āyuḥ pālayam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15_0: śubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca apy asaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15_1: bhojane ca apy amātrajñam hīnam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15_2: tam vai prasahate rāgo vāto vṛkṣam iva abalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15_a_1: bhojane ca apy amātrajñaḥ kusīdo hīna vīryavān /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15_a_2: tam vai prasahate rāgo vāto vṛkṣam iva abalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15a_0: śubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca apy asaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15a_1: bhojane ca apy amātrajñam hīnam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15a_2: tam vai prasahate dveṣo vāto vṛkṣam iva abalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15b_0: śubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca apy asaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15b_1: bhojane ca apy amātrajñam hīnam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15b_2: tam vai prasahate moho vāto vṛkṣam iva abalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15c_0: śubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca apy asaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15c_1: bhojane ca apy amātrajñam hīnam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15c_2: tam vai prasahate māno vāto vṛkṣam iva abalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15d_0: śubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca apy asaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15d_1: bhojane ca apy amātrajñam hīnam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15d_2: tam vai prasahate lobho vāto vṛkṣam iva abalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15e_0: śubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca apy asaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15e_1: bhojane ca apy amātrajñam hīnam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.15e_2: tam vai prasahate tṛṣṇā vāto vṛkṣam iva abalam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16_0: aśubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16_1: bhojane ca api mātrajñam yuktam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16_2: tam na prasahate rāgo vātaḥ śailam iva sthiram //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16_a_0: aśubha anupaśyī virahann indriyair hi susaṃvṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16_a_1: bhojane ca api mātrajñaḥ śrāddha;ārabdha vīryavān /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16_a_2: tam na prasahate rāgo vātaḥ śailam iva parvatam //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16a_0: aśubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16a_1: bhojane ca api mātrajñam yuktam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16a_2: tam na prasahate dveṣo vātaḥ śailam iva sthiram //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16b_0: aśubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16b_1: bhojane ca api mātrajñam yuktam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16b_2: tam na prasahate moho vātaḥ śailam iva sthiram //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16c_0: aśubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16c_1: bhojane ca api mātrajñam yuktam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16c_2: tam na prasahate māno vātaḥ śailam iva sthiram //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16d_0: aśubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16d_1: bhojane ca api mātrajñam yuktam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16d_2: tam na prasahate lobho vātaḥ śailam iva sthiram //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16e_0: aśubha anudarśinam nityam indriyaiś ca susaṃvṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16e_1: bhojane ca api mātrajñam yuktam jāgarikāsu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.16e_2: tam na prasahate tṛṣṇā vātaḥ śailam iva sthiram //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.17_0: ramaṇīyāny araṇyāni na ca atra ramate janaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.17_1: vīta rāgā atra raṃsyante na tu kāma gaveṣiṇaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.18_0: grāme vā yadi vā araṇye nimne vā yadi vā sthale /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.18_1: yatra arhanto viharanti te deśā ramaṇīyakāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.19_0: dūrāt santaḥ prakāśyante himavān iva parvataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.19_1: asanto na prakāśyante rātri kṣiptāḥ śarā yathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.20_0: sadbhir eva saha āsīta paṇḍitair artha cintakaiḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.21_0: aham nāga;iva saṃgrāme cāpād utpatitān śarān /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.21_1: ativākyam titīkṣāmi duhśīlo hi mahā janaḥ // [titikṣāmi]
T07udanav_u:uv_29.22_0: bhave ca aham bhayam dṛṣṭvā bhūyaś ca vibhavam bhave /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.22_1: tasmād bhavam na abhinande nandī ca vibhavena me //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.23_0: aśrāddhaś ca akṛtajñaś ca saṃdhic chettā ca yo naraḥ / [aśraddhaś ca]
T07udanav_u:uv_29.23_1: hata avakāśo vānta āśaḥ sa vai tu uttama pūruṣaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.24_0: mātaram pitaram hatvā rājānam dvau ca śrotriyau /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.24_1: rāṣṭram sānucaram hatvā anigho yāti brāhmaṇaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_29.25_0: yeṣām samnicayo na asti ye parijñāta bhojanāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_29.25_1: śunyatā ca animittam ca vivekaś caiva gocaraḥ / [śūnyatā]
