T07udanav_u:uv_31.7_2: visaṃskāra gate citte;iha eva kṣayam adhyagāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.8a_0: dūram gamam eka caram aśarīram guhāśayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.8a_1: ye cittam damayiṣyanti vimokṣyante mahā bhayāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.9_0: na dveṣī dveṣiṇaḥ kuryād vairī vā vairiṇo hitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.9_1: mithyā praṇihitam cittam yat kuryād ātmanā ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.10_0: na tam mātā pitā vā api kuryāj jñātis tathā aparaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.10_1: samyak praṇihitam cittam yat kuryādd hitam ātmanaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.11_0: yathā hy agāram ducchannam vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.11_1: evam hy abhāvitam cittam rāgaḥ samatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.12_0: yathā hy agāram ducchannam vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.12_1: evam hy abhāvitam cittam dveṣaḥ samatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.13_0: yathā hy agāram ducchannam vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.13_1: evam hy abhāvitam cittam mohaḥ samatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.14_0: yathā hy agāram ducchannam vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.14_1: evam hy abhāvitam cittam mānaḥ samatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.15_0: yathā hy agāram ducchannam vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.15_1: evam hy abhāvitam cittam lobhaḥ samatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.16_0: yathā hy agāram ducchannam vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.16_1: evam hy abhāvitam cittam tṛṣṇā samatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.17_0: yathā agāram succhannam vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.17_1: evam subhāvitam cittam rāgo na vyatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.18_0: yathā agāram succhannam vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.18_1: evam subhāvitam cittam dveṣo na vyatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.19_0: yathā agāram succhannam vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.19_1: evam subhāvitam cittam moho na vyatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.20_0: yathā agāram succhannam vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.20_1: evam subhāvitam cittam māno na vyatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.21_0: yathā agāram succhannam vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.21_1: evam subhāvitam cittam lobho na vyatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.22_0: yathā agāram succhannam vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.22_1: evam subhāvitam cittam tṛṣṇā na vyatibhindati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.23_0: manaḥ pūrvam gamā dharmā manaḥ śreṣṭhā mano javāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.23_1: manasā hi praduṣṭena bhāṣate vā karoti vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.24_0: manaḥ pūrvam gamā dharmā manaḥ śreṣṭhā mano javāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.24_1: manasā hi prasannena bhāṣate vā karoti vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.24_2: tatas tam sukham anveti chāyā vā hy anugāminī //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.25_0: na aprasannena cittena duṣṭena kṣubhitena vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.25_1: dharmo hi śakyam ājñātum saṃrambha bahulena vā //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.26_0: vinīya yas tu saṃrambham aprasādam ca cetasā /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.29_0: srotāṃsi yasya ṣaṭ triṃśan manaḥ prasravaṇāni hi /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.29_1: vahanti nityam durdṛṣṭeḥ saṃkalpair gredha nihśritaiḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.30_0: ratim anusṛtam indriya anugam puruṣam citta vaśa anuvartakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.30_1: yaśa;iha hi jahāti sarvadā drumam iva śīrṇa phalam yathā aṇḍajaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.31_0: ātāpī vihara tvam apramatto mā te kāma guṇo matheta cittam /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.31_1: mā loha guḍām gileḥ pramattaḥ krandan vai narakeṣu pacyamānaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.32_0: utthāna kāleṣu nihīna vīryo vācā balī tv ālasiko nirāśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.32_1: sadā eva saṃkalpa hataḥ kusīdo jñānasya mārgam satatam na vetti //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.33_0: sthūlān vitarkān atha vā api sūkṣmān samudgatān māna samplava artham /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.33_1: vitarkayan vai satatam vitarkān etām sadā dhāvati bhrānta cittaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.34_0: etāṃs tu vidyān manaso vitarkān ātāpavān saṃvaravān smṛta ātmā /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.34_1: jahāty aśeṣān apunar bhavāya samāhito dhyāna rataḥ sumedhāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.35_0: kumbha upamam kāyam imam viditvā nagara upamam cittam adhiṣṭhitam ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.35_1: yudhyeta māram prajñā yuddhena jitam ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.36_0: phena upamam kāyam imam viditvā nagara upamam cittam adhiṣṭhitam ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.36_1: yudhyeta māram prajñā yuddhena jitam ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.37_0: kumbha upamam lokam imam viditvā nagara upamam cittam adhiṣṭhitam ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.37_1: yudhyeta māram prajñā yuddhena jitam ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.38_0: phena upamam lokam imam viditvā nagara upamam cittam adhiṣṭhitam ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.38_1: yudhyeta māram prajñā yuddhena jitam ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.39_0: sambhodhy aṅgeṣu yeṣāṃs tu samyak cittam subhāvitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.39_2: kṣīṇa āsravā vānta doṣās te loke parinirvṛtāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.40_0: sva cittam anurakṣam vai sva vālam camarī yathā /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.40_1: bhūteṣu ca dayā āpannaḥ sukhān na parihīyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.41_0: etam nāgasya nāgena tv īṣā dantasya hastinaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.41_1: sameti cittam cittena yad eko ramate vane //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.42_1: maitraḥ sa sarva sattveṣu vairam tasya na kenacit //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.42a_1: maitraḥ sa sarva prāṇeṣu vairam tasya na kenacit //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.42b_1: maitraḥ sa sarva bhūteṣu vairam tasya na kenacit //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.43_0: ekam api cet prāṇam aduṣṭa citto maitrāyate kuśalam tena hi syāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.43_1: sarvāṃs tu sattvān manasā anukampayan prabhūtam āryaḥ prakaroti puṇyam / [sattvām]*
T07udanav_u:uv_31.44_0: yo hy udagreṇa cittena tv adīnena sadā naraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.44_1: bhāvayet kuśalān dharmān yoga kṣemasya prāptaye //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.45_0: śāntam asya mano bhavati śāntā vāk kāya karma ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.45_1: samyag ājñā vimuktasya hy upaśāntasya bhikṣuṇaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.46_0: pañca aṅgikena tūryeṇa na ratir bhavati tādṛśī /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.46_1: yādṛśy eka agra cittasya samyag dharmān vipaśyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.47_0: sukham svapanti munayo na te śocanti māmikām /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.47_1: yeṣām dhyāna ratam cittam kāmas teṣām na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.48_0: sukham modanti munayo na te śocanti māmikām /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.48_1: yeṣām dhyāna ratam cittam vartmas teṣām na vidyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.49_0: yasya śaila upamam cittam sthitam na anuprakampate /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.49_2: yasya evam bhāvitam cittam kutas tam duhkham eṣyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.50_0: na upavādī na upaghātī prīti mokṣe ca saṃvaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.50_1: mātrajñatā ca bhakteṣu prāntam ca śayana āsanam /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.51_0: citta nimittasya kovidaḥ pravivekasya rasam prajānakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.51_1: dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛto vetti prīti sukham nirāmiṣam //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.52_0: manaś ca yo rakṣati bhāṣitam ca ceṣṭe ca kāyasya sadā eva yuktaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.52_1: sa prāpya śokam hi na duhkhitaḥ syāt satya sthitaḥ satyavidaḥ sumedhāḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.53_0: arakṣitena cittena mithyā dṛṣṭi hatena ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.53_1: stīna middha abhibhūtena vaśam mṛtyor nigacchati / [stīnamiddhābhibhūtena]
T07udanav_u:uv_31.54_0: tasmād rakṣita cittaḥ syāt samyak saṃkalpa gocaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.54_1: samyag dṛṣṭi puraskāro jñātvā caiva udaya vyayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.54_2: stīna middha abhibhūr bhikṣuḥ sarva durgatayo jahet //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.55_0: cittasya hi samyamaḥ sukham cittam rakṣata mā pramadyata /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.55_1: cittena hi vañcitā prajā hy ekatyā narakeṣu pacyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.56_0: cittasya hi samyamaḥ sukham cittam rakṣata mā pramadyata /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.56_1: cittena hi vañcitā prajā hy ekatyā tīryakṣu pacyate // [tiryakṣu]
T07udanav_u:uv_31.57_0: cittasya hi samyamaḥ sukham cittam rakṣata mā pramadyata /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.57_1: cittena hi vañcitā prajā hy ekatyā preteṣu pacyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.58_0: cittasya hi samyamaḥ sukham cittam rakṣata mā pramadyata /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.58_1: citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā manujeṣu modate //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.59_0: cittasya hi samyamaḥ sukham cittam rakṣata mā pramadyata /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.59_1: citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā svargeṣu modate //
T07udanav_u:uv_31.60_0: cittasya hi samyamaḥ sukham cittam rakṣata mā pramadyata /
T07udanav_u:uv_31.60_1: citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā nirvāṇam āpnute //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.1_0: piṇḍa cārikāya bhikṣave hy ātma bharāya hi na anya poṣiṇe /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.1_1: devāḥ spṛhayanti tāyine hy upaśāntāya sadā smṛta ātmane //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.2_0: piṇḍa pātikāya bhikṣave hy ātma bharāya hi na anya poṣiṇe /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.2_1: devāḥ spṛhayanti tāyine na tu satkāra yaśo abhikāṅkṣine //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.3_0: sarva karma jahasya bhikṣuṇe dhunvānasya puraskṛtam rajaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.3_1: amamasya sadā sthita ātmano hy artho na asti janasya lāpanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.4_0: tudanti vācābhir asamyatā janāḥ śarair hi saṃgrāma gatam yathā gajam /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.4_1: śrutvā tu vācām paruṣām udīritām adhivāsayed bhikṣur aduṣṭa cittaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.5_0: yas tv alpa jīvī laghur ātma kāmo yata indriyaḥ sarva gatiḥ pramuktaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.5_1: anokasārī hy amamo nirāśaḥ kāmam jahaś ca eka caraḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.6_0: mātram bhajeta pratirūpam śuddha ājīvo bhavet sadā /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.6_1: pratisaṃstāra vṛttiḥ syād ācāra kuśalo bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.6_2: tataḥ pramodya bahulaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.7_0: hasta samyataḥ pāda samyato vācā samyataḥ sarva samyataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.7_1: ādhyātma rataḥ samāhito hy ekaḥ saṃtuṣito hi yaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.8_0: dharma ārāmo dharma rato dharmam eva anucintayan /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.8_1: dharmam ca anusmaran bhikṣur dharmān na parihīyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.9_0: śunya agāram praviṣṭasya prahita ātmasya bhikṣuṇaḥ / [śūnya agāram]
T07udanav_u:uv_32.9_1: amānuṣā ratir bhavati samyag dharmān vipaśyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.10_0: yato yataḥ saṃspṛśati skandhānām udaya vyayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.10_1: prāmodyam labhate tatra prītyā sukham analpakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.10_2: tataḥ prāmodya bahulaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.11_0: yathā api parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.11_1: evam rāga kṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.12_0: yathā api parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.12_1: evam dveṣa kṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.13_0: yathā api parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.13_1: evam moha kṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.14_0: yathā api parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.14_1: evam māna kṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.15_0: yathā api parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.15_1: evam lobha kṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.16_0: yathā api parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.16_1: evam tṛṣṇā kṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.17_0: yasya samnicayo na asti yasya na asti mamāyitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.17_1: asantam śocate na eva sa vai bhikṣur nirucyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.18_0: bhikṣur na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā bhikṣate parān /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.18_1: veṣmān dharmān samādāya bhikṣur bhavati na tāvatā //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.19_0: yas tu puṇyam ca pāpam ca prahāya brahmacaryavān /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.19_1: viśreṇayitvā carati sa vai bhikṣur nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.20_0: maitrā vihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddha śāsane /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.21_0: maitrā vihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddha śāsane /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.21_1: adhigacchet padam śāntam saṃskāra upaśamam sukham //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.22_0: maitrā vihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddha śāsane /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.22_1: abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasya eva so antike //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.23_0: udagra cittaḥ sumanā hy abhibhūya priya apriyam / [priyā priyam]
T07udanav_u:uv_32.23_1: prāmodya bahulo bhikṣur duhkha kṣayam avāpnuyāt //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.24_1: vānta loka āmiṣo bhikṣur upaśānto nirucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.25_0: na asty aprajñasya vai dhyānam prajñā na dhyāyato asti ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.25_1: yasya dhyānam tathā prajñā sa vai nirvāṇa sāntike //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.26_0: tasmād dhyānam tathā prajñām anuyujyeta paṇḍitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.26_1: tasya aham ādir bhavati tathā prājñasya bhikṣuṇaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.27_0: saṃtuṣṭir indriyair guptiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṃvaraḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.27_1: mātrajñatā ca bhakteṣu prāntam ca śayana āsanam //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.27_2: adhicitte samāyogam yasya asau bhikṣur ucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.28_0: yasya kāyena vācā ca manasā ca na duṣkṛtam /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.28_1: kalyāṇa śīlam āhus tam hrīmantam bhikṣum uttamam //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.29_0: dharmāḥ subhāvitā yasya sapta sambhodha pakṣikāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.29_1: kalyāṇa dharmam āhus tam sadā bhikṣum samāhitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.30_0: iha eva yaḥ prajānāti duhkhasya kṣayam ātmanaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.30_1: kalyāṇa prajñam āhus tam sadā śīlam anāsravam //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.31_0: na śīla vrata mātreṇa bahuśrutyena vā punaḥ /  [bāhuśrutyena]
T07udanav_u:uv_32.31_1: tathā samādhi lābhena vivikta śayanena vā //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.32_0: bhikṣur viśvāsam āpadyed aprāpte hy āsrava kṣaye /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.32_1: spṛśet tu sambodhi sukham akāpuruṣa sevitam //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.33_0: tāpa jāto hy ayam lokaḥ skandhā na ātmā iti manyate /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.33_1: manyate yena yena aham tat tad bhavati ca anyathā //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.34_0: loko ayam anyathā bhūto bhava sakto bhave rataḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.34_1: bhava abhinandī satatam bhavān na parimucyate //
T07udanav_u:uv_32.35_0: yan nandate sa hi bhavo duhkhasya sa bibheti ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_32.35_1: uṣyate bhava hānāya brahmacaryam mama antike //

T07udanav_u:uv_33.34_2: ājñāya dharmam deśayati bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.35_0: sarva kāmān viprahāya yo anagāraḥ parivrajet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.35_1: kāma āsrava visamyuktam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.36_0: nikṣipta daṇḍam bhūteṣu traseṣu thāvareṣu ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.36_1: yo na hanti hi bhūtāni bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.37_1: na lipyate yo hi kāmair bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.38_1: na lipyate yo hi pāpair bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.38a_1: nandī bhāva parikṣīṇam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.39_0: aviruddho viruddheṣu tv ātta daṇḍeṣu nirvṛtaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.39_1: hita anukampī bhūteṣu bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.40_0: yasya rāgaś ca doṣaś ca māno ṃrakṣaś ca śātitaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.40_1: na lipyate yaś ca doṣair bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.41_0: ya;imām parikhām durgām saṃsāra ogham upatyagāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.41_1: tīrṇaḥ pāra gato dhyāyī hy aneyo niṣkatham kathaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.41_2: nirvṛtaś ca anupādāya bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.42_0: na vidyate yasya tṛṣṇā ca asmin loke pare api ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.42_1: tṛṣṇā bhava parikṣīṇam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.43_0: na vidyate yasya ca āśā hy asmin loke pare api ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.43_1: nirāśiṣam visamyuktam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.44_0: hitvā ratim ca aratim ca śītī bhūto niraupadhiḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.44_1: sarva loka abhibhūr dhīro bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.45_0: hitvā manuṣyakān kāmān divyān kāmān upatyagāt /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.45_1: sarva loka visamyuktam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.46_0: gatim yasya na jānanti deva gandharva mānuṣāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.46_1: ananta jñāna samyuktam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.47_0: pūrve nivāsam yo vetti svarga apāyāṃś ca paśyati / [svargāpāyāṃś ca]
T07udanav_u:uv_33.47_1: atha jāti kṣayam prāpto hy abhijñā vyavasito muniḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.47_2: duhkhasya antam prajānāti bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.48_0: cyutim yo vetti sattvānām upapattim ca sarvaśaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.48_1: asaktaḥ sugato buddho bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.49_0: sarva samyojana atīto yo vai na paritasyate / [paritapyate]?
T07udanav_u:uv_33.49_1: asaktaḥ sugato buddho bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.50_1: aneyam snātakam buddham bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.50_a_1: yo aneyaḥ snātako buddho brāhmaṇam tam bravīmy aham //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.51_0: sarva abhibhūm bhava atītam ogha tīrṇam anāsravam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.51_1: pāram gatam visamyuktam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.51_a_0: sarva abhibhūr bhava atīta;ogha tīrṇo vināyakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.51_a_1: pārago hy visamyuktaḥ brāhmaṇam tam bravīmy aham //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.52_0: gata abhidhyam vīta jalpam pāpa citta vivarjitam /  [gatābhidhyam]
T07udanav_u:uv_33.52_1: dhyāyinam vīta rajasam bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.52_a_0: na abhidhyāyen na abhijalpet pāpakānām vivarjayet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.52_a_1: āsīno virajā dhyāyī brāhmaṇam tam bravīmy aham //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.53_0: pāṃsu kūla dharam bhikṣum kāmeṣu niravekṣiṇam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.53_1: dhyāyantam vṛkṣa mūlastham bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.53_a_0: pāṃsu kūla dharo hrīmān kāmeṣu niravekṣakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.53_a_1: niṣaṇṇo vṛkṣa mūle yo brāhmaṇam tam bravīmy aham //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.54_0: yasya ālayo na asti sadā yo jñātā niṣkatham kathaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.54_1: amṛtam ca eva yaḥ prāpto bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.55_0: yasya ālayo na asti sadā yo jñātā niṣkatham kathaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.55_1: dūram gamaś ca eka caro bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.55_a_0: dūram gamam eka caram aśarīram guhāśayam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.56_0: yeṣām ca bhāvito mārgaḥ āryo hy aṣṭa aṅgikaḥ śivaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.56_1: sarva duhkha prahāṇāya lokeṣu brāhmaṇā hi te //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.57_1: damayitvā hy abhijñāya ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.57_2: kṣīṇa samyojanā buddhā lokeṣu brāhmaṇā hi te //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.57_a_1: sūkṣmam padam abhijñāya ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.57_a_2: kṣīṇa samyojanā buddhās te loke brāhmaṇā;iha //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.58_0: chittvā naddhrīn varatrān ca saṃtānam duratikramam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.58_1: utkṣipta parikham buddham bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.58_a_0: chittvā naddhrīn varatrān ye saṃtānam duratikramam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.58_a_1: utkṣipta parikhā buddhās te loke brāhmaṇā;iha //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.59_0: chittvā naddhrīn varatrān ca icchā lobham ca pāpakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.59_1: tṛṣṇām samūlām āvṛhya bravīmi brāhmaṇam hi tam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.59_a_0: chittvā naddhrīn varatrān ye icchā lobham ca pāpakam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.59_a_1: samūlām ca uddhṛtās tṛṣṇām te loke brāhmaṇā;iha //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.60_0: chinddhi srotaḥ parākramya kāmān praṇuda brāhmaṇa /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.60_1: saṃskārāṇām kṣayam jñātvā hy akṛtajño bhaviṣyati //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.60_a_0: chinddhi srotaḥ parākramya kāmān sarvān praṇuda ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.60_a_1: saṃskārāṇām kṣayam jñātvā brāhmaṇo yāti ha anighaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.61_0: mātaram pitaram hatvā rājānam dvau ca sśrotriyau /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.61_1: rāṣṭram sānucaram hatvā anigho yāti brāhmaṇaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.62_0: mātaram pitaram hatvā rājānam dvau ca śrotriyau /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.62_1: vyāghram ca pañcamam hatvā śuddha;ity ucyate naraḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.63_0: na brāhmaṇasya praharen na ca muñceta brāhmaṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.63_1: dhig brāhmaṇasya hantāram dhik tam yaś ca pramuñcati //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.64_0: yasya dharmam vijānīyād vṛddhasya daharasya vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.64_1: satkṛtya enam namasyeta hy agni hotram iva dvijaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.65_0: yasya dharmam vijānīyād vṛddhasya daharasya vā /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.65_1: satkṛtya enam paricared agni hotram iva dvijaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.66_0: yasya dharmam vijānīyādt samyak sambuddha deśitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.66_1: satkṛtya enam namasyeta hy agni hotram iva dvijaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.67_0: yasya dharmam vijānīyāt samyak sambuddha deśitam /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.67_1: satkṛtya enam paricared agni hotram iva dvijaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.68_0: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.68_1: atha ca ekaḥ piśācīm ca bakkulam ca ativartate //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.69_0: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.69_1: atha asya vedanāḥ sarve;astam gacchanti paśyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.70_0: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.70_1: atha asya pratyayāḥ sarve;astam gacchanti paśyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.71_0: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.71_1: atha asya ca āsravāḥ sarve;astam gacchanti paśyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.72_0: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.72_1: atha asya sarva samyogā;astam gacchanti paśyataḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.73_0: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.73_1: atha jāti jarām caiva maraṇam ca ativartate //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.74_0: divā tapati ha ādityo rātrāv ābhāti candramāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.74_1: samnaddhaḥ kṣatriyas tapati dhyāyī tapati brāhmaṇaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.74_2: atha nityam aho rātram buddhas tapati tejasā //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.75_0: na brāhmaṇasya īdṛśam asti kiṃcid yathā priyebhyo manaso niṣedhaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.75_1: yathā yathā hy asya mano nivartate tathā tathā saṃvṛtam eti duhkham //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.76_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.76_1: atha asya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā prajānāti sahetu duhkham //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.77_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.77_1: atha asya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā prajānāti sahetu dharmam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.78_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.78_1: atha asya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayam pratyayānām upaiti //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.79_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.79_1: atha asya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayam vedanānām upaiti //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.80_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.80_1: atha asya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayam hy āsravāṇām upaiti //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.81_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.81_1: avabhāsayaṃs tiṣṭhati sarva lokam sūryo yathā eva abhyudito antarīkṣam //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.82_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.82_1: avabhāsayaṃs tiṣṭhati sarva lokam buddho hi samyojana vipramuktaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_33.83_0: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā;ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya /
T07udanav_u:uv_33.83_1: vidhūpayaṃs tiṣṭhati māra sainyam buddho hi samyojana vipramukta;iti //
T07udanav_u:uv_34_1: anitya kāma tṛṣṇā ca apramādas tathā priyaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_34_2: śīlam sucaritam vāca karma śraddhā ca te daśaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_34_3: śramaṇo mārga satkāro droha smṛti prakīrṇakaḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_34_4: udakam puṣpam aśvaś ca saha krodhena te daśaḥ //
T07udanav_u:uv_34_5: tathā gataḥ śrutam ca ātmā peyālam mitra pañcamam /
T07udanav_u:uv_34_6: nirvāṇam paśya pāpam ca yuga vargaḥ sukhena ca /
T07udanav_u:uv_34_7: cittam bhikṣur brāhmaṇaś ca trayas triṃśatime smṛtāḥ /
T07udanav_u:uv_34_8: vargāḥ samāptāś ca uddānam samyak sambuddha bhāṣitāḥ //
